name: Mahadevan P
headline: Freelance Consultant
summary: Hands on experience of over 38 years in Engineering, Procurement, Commissioning, Operation and Technical Services in Power, Utilities, Chemical and Oil & Gas industry. I had worked on Gas Turbines, Compressors, Steam Turbines, Steam Generators, DG sets, various pumps and equipment in power sector and oil & gas industry. Work experience with clients like Shell, Total, DSME, Chevron, PTTEP, Occidental Petroleum, SMOE. SKILLS AND CAPABILITIES: (a)	Basic and detailed engineering of rotating equipment and packages related to Oil & Gas industry, Power plants and utilities in Chemical, Petrochemical and Refineries. Preparation of Technical Specifications, RFQs and Purchase Specifications, Bid evaluation, review of vendor drawings, performance testing for Turbines and Pumps, Coordination with design & construction agencies, vendors and customer, Man-hour estimate and control. (b)	Commissioning & Operation, Scheduling and delegation of human resources, Commissioning & Operating Procedures, Work Permit procedure, Incident Reports. (c)	Technical Services, Performance Monitoring and Reports, Plant Modifications, Technical Audit, Daily, Weekly, Monthly and Annual Reports for plants. (d)	Class Room and on the job training of engineers and technicians. (e)	Work experience in computer environment. Conversant with MS Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint), MS Projects, Acrobat Professional, Documentum and Internet. Specialties: Rotating Equipment Specialist

People are encouraged to ask questions ,doubts no matter how trivial and experts can share their knowledge. The aim of this group is to spread the knowledge about Steam Turbines and users are recommended to share their experience.

exp_summary2: Managing large account of 700+ Supporting sales Growth and PL of account
exp_summary3: Currently Delivery Partner with Infosys and heading a Delivery unit for Telecom. An alumnus of IIT BHU having excellent academic track record. Proven International Management Experience - Strong exposure to US and Canada markets from both Technology Sales & Delivery Perspective. Have a Strong understanding of the IT Outsourcing Business and the GDM Model. Over twenty Years' Experience in Managing and Delivering Projects and Programs for Global Tier-1 Telco's and their affiliates. Strong background in consulting, sales, account management, project management and running large P&Ls. Managed business worth of 60 M USD per annum and with a team of 500+ people. Experience in setting up new business unit, building competency and capacity and growing that business taking advantage of the confluence of operations and technology. Excellent knowledge of Telecom and high tech industry. Helped a large customer (Fortune 50) with work globalization, IT strategy, new product introductions, online strategy, designing business processes and consolidation in mergers and acquisitions. Winner of multiple excellence awards at Infosys.

The term “Internet of Things” was first documented by a British visionary, Kevin Ashton, in 1999. Typically, IoT is expected to offer advanced connectivity of devices, systems, and services that goes beyond machine-to-machine communications (M2M) and covers a variety of protocols, domains, and applications. The interconnection of these embedded devices (including smart objects), is expected to usher in automation in nearly all fields, while also enabling advanced applications like a Smart Grid. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=4435310&goback=, group_name:-IoT Trends, no_of_members:-1793, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAALfAAAAJDk1NWFlZDJhLTBlYzEtNDY1ZS05MzZkLTI1N2I3NTQ0YjdiYQ.png, group_id:-4435310, group_description:-Group managed by IoT Evolution. name: Rajesh Palakkal
headline: Member of Technical Staff at Affirmed Networks
summary: - Expertise in building and leading geographically dispersed teams focused on technical excellence and delivering reliable and feature-rich solutions for the customer. - Experience in engaging with customers, sales and partners to define the product requirements, develop the roadmap and guiding the engineering teams. - Technical leadership in driving the product and system architecture and solving complex software development and system integration problems to deliver a solution on time. - Over 14 years of C/C++ software development experience (on Linux/VxWorks platforms) working on FMC/VOIP applications, Optical and ATM switching, Control Plane protocols, Cross Connects and redundancy/high availability solutions. Specialties: Technical management, Project leadership, Product management, Product architecture, design and development.

linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-58162, id:-590669, name:-Tim Trampedach, created_date:-2005-04-03 19:47:41, date_and_relationship:-2005-04-03 19:47:41, Tim reported to Rajesh, headline:-Platform BU leader at LendUp & family office investor, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/timtrampedach/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAcCAAAAJDA0ZTM3ODFjLTBmNjAtNGUzNS1hODMwLTg3MWM0NjY1MGJlNg.jpg, summary:-I worked for Raj for about 3 years and could not have asked for a better environment. He provides great technical leadership and without calling his style "hands off", it is very inobtrusive, giving everyone more than enough space and trusting them to make sound decisions. He was also very supportive in letting me try functions outside of his group and ultimately transfering within the company.
exp_summary2: Senior member of the Engineering team working on the ASR 9000 Broadband Network Gateway project with the goal of delivering next generation IPoE and PPPoE focused Session Aware Ethernet services on an integrated BNG/Carrier Ethernet router. - Member of the team responsible for the Subscriber database infrastructure component on the IOS XR platform – a platform independent component distributed across line and control cards responsible for managing the session configuration. - Project lead responsible for driving the control card failover support in the Subscriber database component – for session reconciliation and recovery.
exp_summary3: Key member of a dynamic start-up that has defined the market place for Mobile Unified Communications - developing FMC/VOIP solutions for enterprise mobility. - Collaborate and work with key customers and Sales to gather, prioritize and publish the product requirements for Engineering, design deployments and manage the product life-cycle - Lead and manage a growing engineering team distributed across Boston, Mountain View and Bangalore. - Technical leadership in architecture, design and implementation of the Unified Communication solution - consisting of a Linux based UC Server with an internal Asterisk based PBX and messaging/presence capability, using a SIP based control plane and support for RTP media processing.
exp_summary4: Managerial expertise in building and leading dynamic cross-functional teams focused on technical excellence and delivering reliable and feature-rich solutions for the customers - requiring strong leadership and coordination between the engineering, marketing and sales organizations. - Key member of the team responsible for the architecture, design and development of the control processor and line card software based on embedded (VxWorks) and Linux operating systems for the optical switching platform capable of scaling from a 64x64 to a 1024x1024. - Architecture and development of key features including path protection schemes (diversely routed and stitched circuits), redundancy and high availability solutions
exp_summary5: Software design and development on redundancy, V-UNI, ABR and ATM signaling and call processing working on the ATM switching products (ASX-200, ASX-1000 and ASX-4000).

name: Sanjay Ramchandani
headline: VP, Enterprise Data and Integration at Company Confidential
summary: Sanjay is the Vice President of Enterprise Data,Integration and CRM with a multi billion dollar company and is leading strategic Data and Integration initiatives which directly increase revenue, improve sales with enhanced sales analytics, manage inventory,streamline account payables,efficiently manage procurement and overall improve the company's ability to get better insights in all areas of the business. He is a leader of multicultural, global teams in pursuit of transformations and innovative use of technology.He also manages strategic vendor relationships and also leads the selection and deployment of Enterprise technologies. A skilled C-suite business partner who aligns IT and company strategic goals,and successfully develops,drives and implements new initiatives and innovations across multiple business functions.Highly adept at leading implementations of complex,global business systems;managing change and cultural differences; and running SLA driven software development. Accomplished at negotiating and executing on/off-shore outsourcing arrangements and crisis management.

IT Vendors will not be accepted. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=5018455&goback=, group_name:-SD Times: Software Development News, no_of_members:-1687, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/8/000/262/0fe/1564350.png, group_id:-5018455, group_description:-Software Development Times®, the flagship of D2 Emerge, was launched in February 2000 as the twice-monthly newspaper of record for the software development industry. Set apart from the traditional code-filled technical journals for rank-and-file programmers, SD Times was written from the beginning for the programmer’s boss, the development manager. And in a world where any programmer can search online for any technical tip or trick they want, SD Times’ coverage of what’s happening and what it means endures in print as the No. 1 publication in the software development market. More companies run more ad pages in SD Times than any other developer title (source: IMS: The Auditor). SD Times began reaching 40,000 software development managers, but has expanded carefully over the years and now reaches more than 600,000 project leaders, architects and development managers in 119 countries monthly. Now published monthly, SD Times brings the kind of in-depth reviews of the critical issues facing development management along with traditional original reporting of the news often missed by the broad-based IT industry press—information critical to our readers. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=2219335&goback=, group_name:-Salesforce Professionals, no_of_members:-22393, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/02f/233/0c528cb.png, group_id:-2219335, group_description:-Salesforce Professionals Network <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=6772400&goback=, group_name:-Salesforce Remote / Part Time Projects, no_of_members:-1245, group_id:-6772400, group_description:-With the Salesforce demand in the market, it is important to form a group that can share the small scale projects which requires occasional help with specific experience integrating Salesforce for various business applications. TOGAF is a framework for developing an enterprise architecture. ITWNET (short for ITWorldNET) is the Global IT Professionals Community. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=1913401&goback=, group_name:-The Customer Success Forum, no_of_members:-29674, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAActAAAAJDNmMzViZDFkLTc5NWYtNGEwNS04OTkxLWM0NGNjMzZhZmMzOQ.png, group_id:-1913401, group_description:-The Customer Success Forum -- where The Customer Success Community begins... The advent of the recurring-revenue business model has had profound impacts, and the effects of the change are far from being over. While companies continue the race to gain market share and to fight off competitors in acquiring as many new customers as possible in the shortest amount of time, it’s what happens **after** the initial contract is signed that will be the critical factor of long-term corporate success. Both parties to the subscription agreement make significant investments; the vendor to acquire the customer, the customer to learn and adopt the application -- and neither party profits unless the relationship continues and extends. Sales is an art and a science. So is what comes after, the continuance and deepening of the customer relationship. Service, Support, Satisfaction -- and the ultimate factor of retention: Customer Success. A new era has begun; it’s time for a new approach. The purpose of the group is to discuss the strategy and tactics of retaining customer relationships by enhancing the productivity and profitability of both parties. Sometimes that will involve details of Customer Service, or Customer Support issues or ways to measure and increase customer Satisfaction. All of these are pieces of the larger puzzle. The audience of The Customer Success Forum is CxO's and CS leaders at all levels, and membership is open to all interested professionals. The Customer Success Forum is a part of the Customer Success Association, which offers a variety of resources for customer relationship management and optimization. For more information, visit: http://customersuccessassociation.com <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=4683812&goback=, group_name:-Travel Business Intelligence & Predictive Analytics, no_of_members:-215, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/1b7/033/34927a0.png, group_id:-4683812, group_description:-Independant group of professionals sharing personal technical knowledge on big data, business intelligence, predictive modeling, econometry, revenue managemen, network planning in the area of the Travel Industry. exp_summary1: Sanjay is leading strategic Enterprise wide Data and Integration initiative which directly improve sales with enhanced sales analytics, directly influencing Sales processes and Sales remuneration with innovative insightful sets of processed information, manage inventory,streamline account payables,efficiently manage procurement and overall improve the company's ability to get better insights in all areas of the business. He is a leader of multicultural, global teams in pursuit of transformations and innovative use of technology.He also manages strategic vendor relationships and also leads the selection and deployment of Enterprise technologies. Sanjay and his team define the yearly and three year strategic (as well as sometime short term tactical) IT roadmaps which aligns and influences the future direction of business solutions with the technology vision. His team also provides architecture direction and guidance including and not limited to reference architecture, roadmap blueprints, data architecture and standards, best practices in CRM architecture, CRM org assessment, coding guidelines and automation of deployment using frameworks. Sanjay ensures consistency in solution implementation across Data and Integration using all the above and also by collaborating and creating artifacts and strategies along with the various enterprise application teams across the country and the globe. A skilled C-suite business partner who aligns IT and company strategic goals,and successfully develops,drives and implements new initiatives and innovations across multiple business functions.Highly adept at leading implementations of complex,global business systems;managing change and cultural differences; and running SLA driven software development. Accomplished at negotiating and executing on/off-shore outsourcing arrangements and crisis management.
exp_summary2: •	Led the org assessment of a Real Estate Investment trust with their Salesforce org assessments and architected their File Integration solution. Designed the Advertising spots planning report and gave the users the ability to predict and model the Advertising spots for a Leading Media Advertising solution company. •	Developed Bulk API scripts for Bulk data migration of Insurance cases (10 million of them) using Batch processes and helped extend governance limits in order to bypass or mitigate the risk. •	Enabled collaboration and increased adoption of the retail products for a large retail client by building a partner community. •	Designed a Data loading and management process for a national schooling system to enable them to do Alumni campaigns and Admission marketing’s. •	Architected the Case management from the social feeds for a Large Banking client. This Social Hub platform for the BOA was designed to alleviate some of the social concerns/complaints raised against BOA through Case Management using Service Cloud and Radian6. Key Accomplishments: 	Helped the Program Architect’s with onboarding, certification and collaborate and guide them on their first projects. Led and laid the CRM strategy for the Blackstone group and ensured alignment to the business goals.Architected the overall integration design of various clients to ensure data needed to make informed decisions traverse seamlessly across cloud and firewall boundaries.

name: Padmanabha Das
headline: Co-Founder at Loans Dealz
summary: As a lending specialist, We lead a team that creates financial solutions for people from all walks of life. We create flexible lending structures that will enable your dreams come true.. We provide a complete solution for all of your financing needs,. We don’t just help get loans, we actually tailor the finance to suit your individual home loan, business loan or mortgage loan requirements. We provide innovative offerings to help businesses expand and achieve growth by helping you get the loan you are looking for. As part of a dynamic lending team in India we specialise in the following: •	Home loan •	Lease Rental discounting •	Mortgage Loans •	Business Loans •	Personal Loans •	Secured Over Draft Facilities •	SME Loans We will help you develop the best structure for your lending requirements. We are Direct sales agents of multiple banks based in India and we can come to you to help you with meeting all your financial needs.

name: Shriram Sanjeevi
headline: Retailer by Profession and Choice since 1997
summary: A Retailer by Profession and Choice over the past 20 years, I have played a minuscule part in the Great Indian Retail story that is yet to be fully told. My first job was in 1997 to scoop Ice-Cream at Baskin Robbins’ first outlet in Chennai. Pursued my UG in Commerce, MBA in Marketing, PG Diploma in International Business and Executive Education from IIM Bangalore; have worked with RPG Retail, The Future Group, Bangalore International Airport, Café Coffee Day & Royal Enfield. Key Highlights include: Designing, Leasing, Setting up and managing the Airport Retail Business at BIAL (2006) under the aegis of Zurich Airport. Signed up 140 cafes across the country for Café Coffee Day and established over 160 Dealerships for Royal Enfield across the country including Company operated stores. Was recognized among Top 50 Retail Professionals in India in 2014 by Asia Retail Congress and a citation "Young Achiever Award" honoured by Vels University, India. I share my thoughts on retail at www.MyRetailJourney.com and also write articles for ET Retail and other portals. Distinguished Faculty on Retail Management at IIT Madras, SRM University, Chennai Business School and many other Business Schools in Chennai and Bangalore. I have managed multiple formats across various sizes & locations and experienced across most facets of Modern Domestic and International Retailing. My core skills include deep understanding of Consumer Behavior, approaching the Target Segment through focused Marketing and Communication, working with Internal and External stakeholders & agencies, P/L Responsibility, Employee Training and Customer Service.

If you find something in your job research that you feel may benefit someone else in the group, by all means share it. -Share stories. exp_summary1: Worked closely with product managers to analyze functional requirements and distill them into actionable defined chunks of work. Collaborated with software architects to identify technical feasibility of implementation approaches and provide necessary guidance to ensure scalable and maintainable design Conducted regular code reviews with the team to ensure code maintainability for all current and future development activities. Creation of Telematics Data APIs using SOA and REST. Worked on latest technologies like RabbitMQ and MongoDB to achieve desired scale and throughput for a high transaction telematics data processing system. Mentored and trained new team members as the team experienced exponential growth. Extensive experience in developing Internet/Intranet applications full life cycle development with .NET technology (Web Forms,ASP.NET,Entity Framework, ADO.NET, LINQ, XML, Web services, windows services, IIS,Assemblies). Working Experience with MicroStrategy Suite 9.3.1 (MicroStrategy Desktop, MicroStrategy Web, MicroStrategy Intelligence Server, MicroStrategy Administrator, MicroStrategy Architect, Command Manager and Web SDK). Worked in creating and integrating Microstrategy reports and objects (Attributes, Filters, Metrics, Facts, Prompts, Templates, Consolidation and CustomGroups) with the data warehouse. Experience in Designing and Modeling the Data for Data Warehouse using the different Data Modeling Tools Erwin and Microsoft Visio Experience in IOT/Telematics projects design and development
exp_summary2: • Responsible for development and maintenance of the 'Champions' before and after school project. • Modified existing code to incorporate feature requests, bug fixes and resolve problem reports. • Responsible for modifying and maintaining the relevant MS-SQL databases used by Champions. • Co-ordinated various team efforts and interactions with QA team to ensure on-time software releases. • Managed the assignment and effective resolution of customer feature requests and bug reports
exp_summary3: Interacting with clients as well as team for ticket analysis. Involved in coding and code reviews of the applications Preparing metrics for process improvement and weekly update of project status to project manager and client.

name: Vinodh Ramakannan
headline: Founder & CEO, Spinta Digital
summary: Senior-level hybrid professional working at the intersection of marketing and technology. Experienced in handling businesses with the implementation of modern marketing ideas that can perform effectively across multiple disciplines. With over 15 years of experience, I believe that technological innovations have curved its niche into the entities of businesses. Understanding the breadth of marketing technologies and how organizations effectively integrate them has become more pivotal. The last decade has witnessed an exponential transformation with an increase in consumer intelligence and the versatility of social media, giving rise to technology and marketing strategy to work together. As a hybrid professional, I can state that the value of empowering to digital transformations has now become more critical than ever. At Spinta Digital, I employ forward thinking hybrid professionals who are not just proficient writers and creative thinkers but are also tech savvy, analytical and possess a strong statistical brain to understand human behavior and technological innovations to come up with marketing strategies that can empower the minds of dynamic audiences.

name: Srila Ramanujam
headline: Entrepreneur
summary: Apart from being classified as a Techie for the most part and for quite some time now, I'd rather like to be known to you as a good co-worker that you'd enjoyed working with, a friend, that you'd like to continue being so too, or just a happen chance acquaintance that you might want to know and keep. Well whatever it might be that we have known each other, I would like to cherish the relationship and have you in my "Linked In" network Challenges as they are posed to each of us every single day, and as much as we'd want to make use of them to create that professional niche for ourselves, knowing one another here through that common goal or purpose that brought us in contact sometimes serves to be a far greater need in knowing you and in keeping that connection going. So, All The Very Best in whatever you do..... I am hoping that this might be also yet another chance in finding ourselves discover our common passions of interest, and in partnering further to enjoy them as a joint effort. Keep it going, live large and its good to fall back upon that quote that often comes to my mind "Life isn't a rehearsal, and hope you enjoy it in your own sweet way every single day" Specialties: Entrepreneurship, Business Analysis, Systems Analysis Java, SQL Server, FileNet

name: Parthasarathy Gopalan
headline: Associate Director at Cognizant
summary: ●	16+ years experience in IT industry with rich international experience supporting diversified stakeholders across the world ●	Experience managing large and complex Programs using Agile and waterfall ●	Manage resources by attracting right talents, retain good performers, mentor resources and performance management. ●	Experience managing green-field development projects using various technologies (PEGA, Webmethods, .Net, etc) ●	Experience managing global service desk and support teams (L1, L2 and L3) for multi-national banks ●	Over 7 years experience working for multinational banks (Merrill Lynch, Barclays Capital, Citi Bank and UBS) ●	Experience managing cost-center for APAC region with an eye for cost reduction by performance improvements ●	Accountable for end-to-end project/service delivery for clients in high pressured environment; Escalation point for resolving conflicts, manage portfolio of projects against conflicting priorities by closely working with vendor managers and internal clients in global outsourcing model ●	Build strong relationship with business owners/sponsors, constantly look for opportunity to expand the service offerings and provide business case to move projects from high cost location to low cost locations, factoring in risk and local regulations.Manage senior business and IT stakeholders, monthly and quarterly operational service review, and manage cost transparency and escalations.

edu_school_name1: S.P. Jain Institute of Management & Research
exp_summary2: - One Warranty Solution for Ford Motors using PEGA. Agile delivery model is used to deliver this project. - International Outward Fund transfer for Military Bank using BPM (webmethods). The project also involves integrating with bank's T24 and SWIFT payment system. End to end project delivery in iterative delivery model for Vietnam client. - Loans dispersement for Military Bank using BPM (webmethods).
exp_summary4: - Accountable for end-to-end service delivery for portfolio of 35 applications - Manage multi-vendor (global vendors) teams with conflicting priorities to deliver high quality service to internal clients - Responsible to manage the APAC cost center by minimizing the cost by performance improvements - Work with IT and business stakeholders to prioritize projects by allocating budget with conflicting priorities
exp_summary5: - Managed the Research IT APAC cost center with teams spread across in Singapore and Kiev - Manage suite of 6 products with external clients: POINT (Portfolio and Index analysis Tool), Indices and Research Publication tools - Build strong relationship with stakeholders to get budget for service offerings and provided business case for moving to low cost centers - Build the team from almost scratch by attracting and retaining right talents for success of the program - Managed escalations from senior stakeholders successfully by motivating the team for better performance
exp_summary6: - Handling the team for development, maintenance and enhancing the client-server application for Commercial Mortgage Backed Securities (CMBS) back-office system using C# and Sqlserver 2005. - Responsible for Functionality and Quality of project deliverables including translating Business Requirements to Technical Specification, Plan, Estimates, Project Tracking, and Delivery checks before rollout. - Represent team during program review with Unit manager and Director - Owning Knowledge Management sessions within the team and Business Users in United Kingdom.
exp_summary7: - Led teams at Onsite & Offshore to develop, maintain and enhance client-server back-office applications for Trust Administration & Accounting division (part of Private Banking) of Merrill Lynch using C# and Sqlserver 2005. - Responsible for translating the business requirement to design and also to propose new solutions for Business users. - Working closely with Business Users of Merrill Lynch from London, Isle of Man, Geneva and Singapore. - Collect and Provide metrics for stakeholders
exp_summary8: - Provided project leadership for 5 employees to develop, maintain and enhance client-server application for Citibank, Germany using VB6 and Sqlserver 2000. - Responsible for Knowledge Transfer from Citibank business users to IT team in India, Design, estimate, execute, provide UAT & implementation support to Citibank team. Has also given proto-type presentation to the clients in Germany during one of the visits. - Collected different metrics and published the same - Created the Statement of work and Software project plan for Citibank. - Led team of 5 resources to SOX business analysis for Lloyds TSB, London
exp_summary9: Worked as consultant for a company called BusinessIT in Denmark to develop a software product using ASP and sqlserver.
exp_summary10: - Responsible for design, develop, test and provide UAT and implementation support using VB6 and Oracle. - Designed a new reporting solution that improved the waiting time and also provided sophisticate solution like schedule manager, template for reports and notification services to the users.
exp_summary11: Responsible for design, develop, test and provide UAT and implementation support using VB4 and Oracle.

The idea is simply to connect aspiring & practicing architects (CEO, CIO, CTO, Chief Architects, VP / Director IT, Managers, Architects),so that the enormous volume of communication can be replaced with the wisdom and guidance of quick & practical, easy-to-understand ideas which could help you to manage change & complexity better. name: Pravin Devanathan
headline: Principal at A.T. Kearney
summary: •	Deep expertise in consumer industries gained through diverse projects with industry leaders in Apparel, FMCG & Retail •	Cross-cultural exposure of working with clients & markets across APAC (developed & developing markets) over 10 years of consulting & industry experience •	Executed multiple end-to-end cost transformation and value-enhancement programs spanning across the entire value chain for top FMCGs & apparel retail companies in recent years Key areas of expertise: 1) Retail Strategy 2) Cost transformation & value creation 3) Strategic and operation due diligence

name: Asif Ali
headline: Building something new
summary: Technologist, tech entrepreneur, architect, and builder of disruptive products. Deeply passionate about technology, web-scale computing and ad-tech. I previously co-founded Reduce Data (http://reducedata.com), a big-data driven advertising technology platform that delivers highly optimized media spends. Reduce Data is based in Sunnyvale, CA Prior to that, I ran ZestADZ - A Global mobile advertising network which was acquired by Komli Media in July, 2011. Prior to ZestADZ, I co-founded ThreeSixty Technologies / Aztec wireless - a Kuala Lumpur / Chennai based mobile wireless technology firm.

name: Murali Natarajan
headline: Service Director Asia Pacific at LBS , A Danaher Corporation, US
summary: twenty three years of experience at Leica Biosystems , Danaher Corporation, leading Customer Service team. Leica Biosystems is global leader in workflow solutions and automation from biopsy to diagnosis, presence in more than 100 countries, sales & service organization in 19 countries and an international network of dealers with the mission " Advancing Cancer Diagnostics Improving Lives " headquartered in Nussloch , Germany. Leica Biosystems is one of the Opco under umbrella of Danaher Corporation, USA. Danaher Corporation is $20.1b in revenue 2015, rank #133 on the Fortune 500 with 80,000 + associates globally.

edu_field_of_study4: Business Management - Marketing and Related Support Services
exp_title2: Divisional Manager Service & Customer Care , Leica Biosystems India and SAARC Countries
exp_summary2: Heading Leica Biosystems Service Support , INDIA & SAARC Countries Managing team of 20 associates
exp_title3: Interim Country Manager , Sales & Service , Leica Biosystems India and SAARC Countries
exp_summary3: Worked as interim Country Manager in Leica Biosystems , India & SAARC Countries in interim period of 1 year ( May2014 - June 2015 ) P&L responsibility , Developing and Executing Sales Business Plans Achieving annual Sales targets Managing team of 40 associates Developing and maintaining strategic relationships with Key Accounts Coaching and developing Account Managers, Business Manager & Application Scientist Responsible for delivering Sales Plan & strategy planning, Cross functional operation, Budgeting & managing expenses with in budget. Identify and develop strategic relationships with senior management in Key Accounts. Launch of new products to Indian Market and developing marketing strategy, product pricing and positioning. Managed import licence & state drug licence requirements for Antibodies products launch. Establish market for Antibodies & reagents products , Business transfer by acquisition from distributors to direct, setting up warehouse and distribution channel partners. Building brand name , taking initiatives in co-ordination with Marketing team that include seminars and exhibitions, participation in customer events, workshops, road shows, user forums, Distributor appointment & Management in SAARC Countries Providing coaching to direct reports, VOC visits, drive service organisation towards customer satisfaction and service revenue growth. Overall responsible for Biosystems Business Operation in India.
exp_summary4: Achieve all India service & consumables target Manage all India Service Support team on the Core Histology Products and Nanotechnology Products Generate revenue by service contracts, spares sales, consumables, amc sales drive business towards customer satisafction organise service training for FSE , conduct meetings review performance and derive action plan responsible to maintain low response time & down time Inventory planning and management of sapres and consumables Develop sales in Core Histology Consumable Market Product support for Nanotechnology products Specimen Prepration for Electron Microscopy Technical / Sales support for Core Histology Instrument sales
exp_title5: National Manager Service and Product Manager Nanotechnology
exp_summary5: Joined as Sales & Service Engineer in 1996 to 2000 for Leica Histology Specimen Preparation Products, Nano Technology products, covering area for sales Tamil Nadu and Andhra Pradesh, achieve sales and service targets, from Year 2001 started focusing on Service for Leica SSP & UM in South India in Service Manager position and from year 2008 got national responsibility to handle a team of 14 FSE and 3 RSM for Customer Service and Consumables sales, worked in position of National Service Manager for Leica SSP. responsible for revenues from contracts, spares, Histology consumable sales with added responsibility of Product Manager for Nano Technology prodcuts - Electron Microscopy Sample Preparation
exp_summary6: worked as Service Engineer for ICU and Physiotheraphy products, support sales in demos , manage service operation in Gujarath, MP, Tamilnadu, Kerala, AP, Orrisa

name: Binand Sethumadhavan
headline: COO - Rummy at Gaussian Networks
summary: Technology professional with more than 17 years of experience in Online Gaming industry. Experienced in the Acquisition-Conversion-Retention model and the Virtual Goods Sales Model. Also experienced in collecting and evaluating player feedback, product roadmap specification and execution, building the teams and support structure, organizing game design and software development, deployment and continuing operations at datacenters and Cloud infrastructure (EC2) to facilitate high-availability and large transaction volumes. Additional experience in Information Security including policy formulation and implementation, IS Risk Management, Audits and Compliance and Security Operations. High reliance on data-driven decision making, with experience of several third-party tools and developing such tools in-house for specific use-cases.

Linux, currently, is increasingly being used in businesses as a back-end server. It serves as a file/print/webserver sitting in a corner of a server room, executing jobs faithfully and reliably. Linux will be used more and more in what it does best – as a server. Linux will move from the server rooms of these offices to the desks of the users. The number of productivity applications for Linux is growing and will grow to reach the critical mass where, Linux will be a viable alternative to the most popular of the desktop operating system environments. Linux India will actively participate in the growth of Linux in India – both in corporates and homes. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=3284320&goback=, group_name:-Online Gaming Jobs | Worldwide, no_of_members:-9505, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/4/005/054/149/0fb7d67.png, group_id:-3284320, group_description:-Looking to further enhance your career and experience? linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-9327920, id:-40749775, name:-Gautam Naidu, created_date:-2012-11-01 03:08:44, date_and_relationship:-2012-11-01 03:08:44, Gautam studied with Binand, headline:-Vice President - Business Development at Talentica Software, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/naidugautam/, summary:-In the 4 years that we were colleagues in the Aerospace Engg. Dept. at IIT Bombay, I found Binand to be a rare combination of high scholastic aptitude, creativity and zest for co-curricular activities. Coupled with his confidence and pleasant personality, he would be an asset to any organization he works with. <> profile_member_id:-39120632, id:-18082034, name:-Srividya A, created_date:-2010-04-20 20:52:34, date_and_relationship:-2010-04-20 20:52:34, Srividya studied with Binand, headline:-Sales@Bosch, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/srividya-a-30812711/, summary:-An avid debater, a highly structured thinker and a great friend...that's how I'd like to describe Binand. Intelligent and EXTREMELY well read, he has a far superior and innate ability to think through issues and build up arguments in a logical and structured manner. A fighter all his life, he aims high and works hard to achieve his goals. I am sure his ability to maintain composure in difficult situations, optimism and confidence will stand him in good stead all his life. I would always love to work for a boss like Binand - cool headed, friendly, highly competent technically and one who's ever willing to share knowledge. I consider it my good fortune to have come across a person of Binand's stature and calibre, during my stay at IIM Calcutta. Lots of things to learn from him! <> profile_member_id:-1068020, id:-14087377, name:-Keith Laidlaw, created_date:-2009-10-22 23:00:52, date_and_relationship:-2009-10-22 23:00:52, Keith senior than Binand, headline:-CTO, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/keith-laidlaw-098436/, summary:-Binand network expertise is exceptional. Good Luck Binand. <> profile_member_id:-5486213, id:-3244729, name:-Nitin Jain, created_date:-2008-01-10 22:23:18, date_and_relationship:-2008-01-10 22:23:18, Nitin senior than Binand, headline:-Angel Investor at Indian Angel Network, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/ndjain/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAIAAQDGAAwAAQAAAAAAAAsNAAAAJDgzMDk0ZGU4LTg2Y2YtNDE5Mi1hNGEwLTgzZjE3MWZjYTc4MQ.jpg, summary:-Binand has an exceptional knowledge about networking and systems. We were managing a site that generated revenues in excess of a billion dollars a year, and Binand was the overall incharge of designing and managing the hardware and servers. There was never a problem that he could not solve and that also in good time. The other thing that impressed me was his constant endeavor to optimize and make processes/work more efficient. No wonder he could manage 3 datacenters with 500+ servers single handedly (when situation demanded or when we had a huge problem). I recommend Binand very highly, and would be delighted to have him on any team going forward. On a personal side, though sometimes he gives you a feeling of being a Network genius (read geek), he is very well read and enjoys quizzing and all other mental games. A fun guy to be with.

exp_summary2: Continuation as the head of the Social Gaming division (details below), which was launched in mid-2015 as a separate brand, Ultimate Games. We currently have four titles live on the Google Play Store. - Further optimisations of the SDLC process, - Introduction of automation in developer testing and QA processes, - Introduction of the concept of Continuous Integration in Delivery. Today Ultimate Games operates a gaming platform with more than 150,000 DAUs. We make minor feature releases several times a week non-intrusively. Our platform has grounds-up support for A/B Testing of features; and we run multiple parallel experiments at any point in time.
exp_location3: Mumbai Area, India; Bengaluru Area, India
exp_summary3: Individual positions are listed separately. In addition to the functional and divisional responsibilities, I have been participating throughout in the executive management process of the company; some examples are: - Processes and metrics in HR, including the early versions of the company's performance evaluation system - Various process improvements in CRM - Candidate evaluation criteria for several middle and senior level positions - Several internally used metrics include those for game demand and player LTV - Many compliance-related projects (eg: Bucketed Withdrawal System) - Policies and Procedures for various compliance requirements
exp_summary4: Head of the newly constituted BI team of Play Games24x7. The team went from being ad-hoc in 2011 to a 10-member critical business functional team supporting initiatives in pretty much every department (Marketing, Operations, Customer Service, Strategic Planning, Roadmap Evolution, Finance). I conceptualized the team itself, obtained stakeholder buy-in to the roadmap and then: - Consolidated all the then-disparate reporting tasks in various departments, - Hired the initial set of people from within the organization and later specialists from outside, - Defined and executed selection criteria for ETL, Reporting and Warehouse, - Adjusted the software development process so that reporting requirements are considered at every stage. In addition to the above, I worked with the Acquisition, Retention and Product teams during much of this period to analyse the reports produced by the BI system; I would conduct weekly meetings with these teams to look closely at the movements of each KPI and try to decipher the underlying reasons. We would devise hypotheses, plan their tests and execute them. Today the BI team in Play Games24x7 delivers several hundred KPIs to stakeholders with trend and other relevant information using a reasonably sophisticated toolchain combination.
exp_summary5: Head of the Bangalore SDC and CTO of Games24x7's social gaming division. Our first title, Call it Right, is currently available on Google Play, iTunes Store, Facebook App Center and till it was live, Yahoo Games. Over these past two years, I have: - Built the Social Games team, - Organized the SDLC process along Agile lines, - Released versions of the game as per a pre-defined roadmap, - Ensured continuing operations of the game on the Amazon EC2 Cloud Computing system, and - Analyzed game performance that suggested several minor and major improvements.
exp_summary6: I was responsible for Development, QA, Delivery and Operations of the flagship product, the game of Rummy on games24x7.com. - Streamlined development process and managed multiple projects for the company - Took the company through a PCI-DSS audit - Took several crucial in-source or outsource decisions - Rationalized the company's IT infrastructure spend and achieved cost cut of 10% in the first quarter itself - Built the team of professionals; was instrumental in several key hiring (either as hiring manager or as part of selection panel) I oversaw the company's transition from a single-product company to one that offered a portfolio of products - in short, the transition from being a game operator to a gaming platform operator.
exp_summary7: Individual positions are listed separately. I started as a software developer, switched to IT operations and then steadily progressed towards more senior roles in datacenter provisioning, IT management, Information Security and network architecture. Note that PartyGaming Plc., the company for which I worked, merged with bwin Interactive Entertainment AG in 2011 to become bwin.party Digital Entertainment, which was acquired in 2015 by GVC Holdings Plc.
exp_summary8: Provided vision and direction to the software development team in building secure and scalable distributed architectures aligned with the products roadmap of the company. Architected customer Single Sign-on system for multiple web properties to improve customer experience and create cross-selling opportunities. Designed automated software signing for PKI-based integrity management of downloaded software to protect customers from man-in-the-middle attacks. Incorporated security architecture into the software development process itself, starting at the requirements gathering stage.
exp_summary9: Yet another relocation to PartyGaming's corporate headquarters in Gibraltar, where the company was consolidating all its gaming operations functions. From Q4/2004 to Q3/2007, the IT team's focus had been on supporting the explosive business growth; and at the same time adhering to the exacting standards required by one of the world's most regulated industries. We honed our procedures so that a rackful of servers could be put in production use in less than 1 hour; we had disaster recovery set up across the Atlantic Ocean with about 35 seconds lag. We deployed the very best in IDS and IPS; we had proven need-to-access based separation between application and database layers. I provided managerial leadership to a team of 7 systems and network engineers. I was responsible for all aspects of datacenter provisioning and operations and managed and delivered several datacenter implementation and forklift upgrade projects keeping up with company strategy at multiple worldwide locations. This team introduced many new innovative technology solutions in the company. We were responsible for e-Commerce and Gaming sites availability, security, 24x7 support and customer experience on the network. I was personally responsible for team morale, motivation and incentivizing.
exp_summary10: Relocated to Montreal to be at-site of PartyGaming's primary datacenter while the company scaled up rapidly; in this period the became the world leader in online gaming services. The company's IPO in June 2005 was a massive success, immediately catapulting it into the FTSE 100 index.
exp_summary11: Cysphere.com underwent a name change to Ivy Comptech.
exp_summary12: I was a member of the team chosen to facilitate the launch of the company's BPO operations; This BPO eventually became one of the largest and most influential in the city with close to 1,500 employees. Part of the team that built a 1200-seater call center in Hyderabad Built the team that provided 24x7 IT support to the call-center Assisted in implementation and operation of CRM and Accounting software Lead developer and project manager of IPMapper, our internal geolocation software. Delivered the software on target and deployed with tremendous success (reduction of 34% in frauds). Member of the team that shifted PartyGaming's production datacenter from Dominican Republic to Montreal (Canada) and London (UK). We planned and executed this project with zero downtime.
exp_company_name13: Yahoo! Web Services India Pvt. Ltd
exp_summary13: Member of Yahoo Messenger server-side team
exp_summary14: Retort Software was then a startup company offering IT products, services and consulting to companies that wanted to use the then-nascent Internet to improve efficiency and communications and reduce paperwork. Its clients list included many of the manufacturing companies in the industrial belt in and around Pune and several services companies based in Mumbai. I was among the earliest employees of the company and developed many of the features of its flagship product, Alice. I was also involved in pre-sales demo, installation and post-sales technical support of the product - which required me to travel throughout western and central Maharashtra.

name: Latha Sundar
headline: A Chartered Scientist with PMP certification
summary: A highly versatile and experienced professional in Analytical Chemistry with a proven ability to drive research projects from lab-based experiments to the market-ready product by designing, developing and validating to international standards in the scientific field. An organised and self-motivated scientist with good written and verbal communication skills and proven ability to handle multi-task, paying close attention to detail. With a blend of scientific and project-management skills can take up and complete challenging projects in chemical and biotechnology field to the highest standards.

name: Audithyan Krishnan
headline: SVP and Head CoE Finance Information Management @ Standard Chartered GBS
summary: Business Manager with 18 plus years of experience in Finance, Technology, Operations and Project / Program Management Strong business, people and financial management skills focused on delivering efficient and effective processes Masters degree in Business Administration (MBA) from the University of Connecticut Certified Project Management Professional (PMP)

name: Palaniraja Muthukmumarasamy
headline: Chief Information Security Officer at Sify Technologies Limited.
summary: Visionary Leader, mentor and motivator. Presently engaged in leading Governance, Risk and Compliance of Sify Technologies Ltd. Designing security policy framework to comply with regulatory compliance and corporate requirements. Committed professional with experience in diverse challenging leadership roles. A result driven IT professional with extensive work experience in Information Security Arena. Believe, Leadership is the key to organizational excellence. Presently leading a team of professionals engaged in Information security practice and Network security operations. Specialties: IT Security, Corporate governance, GRC, Corporate Risk Assessment, Vulnerability Management and penetration testing, Compliance Management, Business Continuity Planning and implementation.Managed Security Services(MSS), Professional Services.

Please note: to facilitate the peer environment, the CIO Forum does not accept line of business executives at technology companies, consultants, recruiters or non-IT practitioners. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=106262&goback=, group_name:-Security Information and Event Management (SIEM), no_of_members:-21403, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/011/0f5/03dff83.png, group_id:-106262, group_description:-Security Information and Event Management (SIEM) solutions are a combination of the formerly disparate product categories of SIM (security information management) and SEM (security event management). SIEM technology provides real-time analysis of security alerts generated by network devices and applications. SIEM solutions come as software, appliances or managed services, and are also used to log security data and generate reports for compliance purposes. The acronyms SEM, SIM and SIEM have been used interchangeably, though there are differences in meaning and product capabilities. The segment of security management that deals with real-time monitoring, correlation of events, notifications and console views is commonly known as Security Event Management (SEM). The second area provides long-term storage, analysis and reporting of log data and is known as Security Information Management (SIM). The term Security Information Event Management (SIEM), coined by Mark Nicolett and Amrit Williams of Gartner in 2005, describes the product capabilities of gathering, analyzing and presenting information from network and security devices; identity and access management applications; vulnerability management and policy compliance tools; operating system, database and application logs; and external threat data. A key focus is to monitor and help manage user and service privileges, directory services and other system configuration changes; as well as providing log auditing and review and incident response. As of January 2012, Mosaic Security Research identified 85 unique SIEM products. Regex Ninjas, SOC Operators, Parsers Gods, Developers, Managers, Log Field Experts, etc... All of you are Welcome. Do not post new group announcements or try to sell products or services with out Group Manager approval. People who do will be removed from the group without warning and posting will be deleted. linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-71862109, id:-578641785, name:-Paul Prabhu, created_date:-2016-03-23 04:01:26, date_and_relationship:-2016-03-23 04:01:26, Paul reported to Palaniraja, headline:-Solution Architect at Sify Corp, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/paul-prabhu-a5109620/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/6/005/088/277/25626de.jpg, summary:-It’s my honour to recommend Palaniraja who is the best manager in my career. He is simply superb on technical expertise and business strategies. I had the pleasure of working with Palani on several new projects and with new clients as well. name: Vijaykumar Sreenivasan
headline: Director IT at Eli Research India (P) Ltd.
summary: A Professional with Twenty years broad based experience at senior levels in P&L as well as functional roles in IT and other industries. Experience in Large account Management, Delivery, Program Management & Pre-Sales in IT Services. Strategic Planning, Finance & Accounts functional experience in Infrastructure, Steel & Auto industries Specialties: Setting and Driving Unit targets, P&L and heading large teams in top IT companies. Experience in setting up new Business Unit, Conceptualize and develop new Product. Mining & growing large Accounts with CXO level relationships in the USA. IT delivery experience with BFSI / education clients for USA / Europe and South Asia. Managed accounts having Mainframe / AS 400 / MS .NET technologies portfolio

Strictly restricted to Chairman, MD, CEO, Director, GM, President, VP, CFO, CTO, COO and CSO, etc of Indian Industry or from India. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=3451751&goback=, group_name:-Government in the Cognitive Era, no_of_members:-34678, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAASPAAAAJGZlODhmNmM1LTBiODUtNGRlZS1hOGVhLTAzNTBlNjAwNWNlMQ.png, group_id:-3451751, group_description:-Improving the lives of citizens, meeting elevated demands for service and enhancing economic vitality are just some of the challenges government and leaders face in the data driven economy. Challenges around how to increase efficiency, deliver enhanced citizen services and improve programs outcomes have always existed, but the technology available now gives leaders in all industries, including government the ability to augment human capabilities, in uncovering insights, predicting outcomes and making evidence based decisions at scale and at speed. The cognitive era will transform the way government agencies operate, enabling them to deepen the engagement with citizens and interactions can be personalized and tailored to the needs of the individual. Government in the Cognitive Era is the place where conversations between thought leaders, inspiring thinkers and city officials and governments around the globe are encouraged. It is a place where people can connect to share ideas and explore how to make the way we live and work better. Together we can discover ways in which the organizations across the globe focused on citizen-centric services can use technology to help decipher all the data to address the challenges of today and prepare for tomorrow. We will be posting case studies, white papers, interviews and a whole raft of materials that show the efforts being made along the cognitive journey for companies, industries, and governments as they develop digital strategies that deploy analytics, cloud, mobile, security, Internet of Things to address their challenges head on - turning data into insights, enhancing program outcomes, mitigating threats and most importantly improving the quality of life for the citizens and communities they serve. This group is managed by Angela Warner, Tisha Loftus, Rakesh Ravindran, Anca Nichita, Raluca Georgiana Popa and follows the IBM Social Computing Guidelines. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=43128&goback=, group_name:-HR Global Leaders Network, no_of_members:-40852, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAA1OAAAAJDI0NWVjOTQyLTRhMmEtNDQ4Ny04NTBhLTAwZGIzMjIzMmQyNA.png, group_id:-43128, group_description:-Pre-screened Global Executives from the field of HR and Business.Selective posts, great jobs and news that will help you get ahead of the curve. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=36556&goback=, group_name:-IIM Society, no_of_members:-8039, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/0ce/0d7/176d3d2.png, group_id:-36556, group_description:-We have 20 IIMs as of now with various regional alumni chapters and groups. name: Anup Panthaloor
headline: BPS Market Leader - Healthcare BPaaS at Cognizant
summary: Seasoned Executive with extensive experience in Relationship Management, Sales, Business Development, Quality , Operations and Consulting. Six Sigma Master Black Belt with extensive experience in Operations / Business Process Services Outsourcing (BPO) focused on Consultative Sales, Business Development, Strategic Account Management, Relationship Management and Deal Financials Structuring Responsible for P&L Management for Large BPO Customer Portfolio of US Healthcare Payors, End-to-end experience in US Healthcare industry across payors, pharmacy benefit management companies, intermediaries, clearinghouses, medical benefits & utilization management organizations, providers, revenue cycle management product/service companies and billing services companies Focused on Building long-term trust based relationships Collaborating with customers to help them evolve into next generation operations that maximize End-Customer Experience while minimizing Total Cost of Operations through process and technology led transformations Overseeing Solution Design, Pricing, Transition Management and Ongoing Client Service Delivery Assurance across Traditional BPO as well as Business Process as a Service (BPaaS) sourcing models Building creative and complex multi-tier BPO deal structures across effort, transaction, outcome, contingency, revenue sharing and PMPM models Specialties: Account Management( P&L ) Business Development Contracting and Deal Negotiations BPO Consulting Financial Modeling Transition Management Delivery Management Quality Management - Six Sigma Master Black Belt, ISO 9001:2000, ISO 27001, COPC,eSCM

name: Sowmy VJ
headline: Global consulting partner, innovator, investor and start-up mentor.
summary: •	I am a senior consulting partner, with 20+ years of experience in Operational Risk , within the BFSI Sector. •	I believe in developing long term client relationships, at the top management level. I work with clients in their transformational journeys, and help them develop practical and pragmatic solutions to their most difficult risk management questions. •	I help clients re-imagine banking, and financial services over the next decade and develop solution offerings to target the operating model of the future •	I work with startups in the fintech/regtech space, to help them develop better customer stories, and to jointly develop go to market strategies with my firm. •	I seek to understand client's business strategies, pain points and roadmap for the next 5-10 years and work with my firm to develop appropriate solutions •	I have been able to develop lasting relationships, across groups within the firms I worked for, without any line of authority •	Over the last 15 years, I have mentored and coached over 1000+ risk professionals globally •	I have been a major contributor to the hiring, training, and coaching of professionals, across practice groups at my firm •	I have lived and worked in 7 countries, and have worked with people of 73 nationalities, thereby enhancing my cultural sensitivity and influence profile •	As an entrepreneur, I have started, run and profitably sold 4 companies • Since I have worked with many companies, I have a really good understanding of culture, performance drivers and organizational dynamics to work on appropriate solutions to running the firm •	Outside of work, I help startups in the social entrepreneurship space to develop products to solve problems at the bottom of the pyramid, and run transformational groups that solve problems at the grass roots level. So far, I have mentored 100+ startups, globally. I am a music, art, architecture, nature lover and a great foodie (vegetarian). Liberal and public policy critic.

linkedin_publications: publication_title:-GRC Simplification: Insights from our global survey, publication_url:-http://sites.tcs.com/blogs/drive-governance/grc-global-survey-insights/, publisher:-Tata Consultancy Services, publication_description:-Think Governance, Risk and Compliance (GRC), and we immediately imagine numerous controls regulating an already overcomplicated business world. exp_summary5: * Trusted advisor for several banks * Offers specialist advice on : Business Resilience Business Continuity Crisis Management Information Security Strategy Physical Security •Advised a leading regional Islamic Bank in Business Continuity Management and assisted them in establishing a Business Continuity culture in the bank •Built the Information Protection and Business Resilience service line •Established trusted advisor status with central banks and commercial banks in the region •Advised several banks towards achieving business resilience, process improvements in the Retail/ Commercial Banking space and alternate process/ work arrangements •Performed risk assessments – key financial and operational risks •Key note speaker on Business Continuity Management, IT Transformation, Information Security •Established Governance structure and provided terms of reference for Board Sub-committees as per Central Bank norms
exp_summary6: *Consultancy Vision & Strategic/Operational Planning *Reorganization, Viral Change & Turnaround Management *Joint Ventures & Strategic Business Partnerships *Re-engineering Operations & Process Improvement *Consistent profit growth, from key customer accounts *Negotiating/Bidding Large Government /Private sector Contracts *Client Relationships at Board and CxO levels *Global Market Penetration & Pricing Strategies *Forecasting & Budgeting (Operating & Capital) *Cost Reduction/Containment & Profit Optimization Strategies *Thought Leadership and IP management
exp_summary7: *Led a strategic change program, with a portfolio covering operations excellence, mindset change, and increased sales for a specialist consulting practice ,assisted in developing the market , segmented and helped managers in pursuing key clients and helped recruit & retain a large talented pool of security & business continuity professionals *Consulted with a leading bank in Singapore for the design of their Operational Risk & Control process and assisted in implementing a Risk & Control Self Assessment (RCSA) system *Developed business continuity strategies including alternate site and regional relocation for a leading US retail bank and designed the plans for the critical functions *Assisted a large supermarket chain in California with an Information Security and Compliance strategy and helped them build their policies and procedures *Consulted with a large US bank in establishing a security and compliance program and assisted the C level sponsor in structuring the Information Security Office , moving it from the CIO’s office *Managed the rollout of Operational Risk & Control self assessment programme for a Fortune 10 global bank *Advised a large US mortgage services client on security strategy/roadmap for compliance and assisted them in creating policies, procedures and standards for information security *Advised a large insurance client on compliance to multiple regulations and reduced compliance costs by adopting a rationalized set of controls *Advised a large US financial services client on establishing a IT governance framework and also helped them with setting up roles, responsibilities, and establish an IT Strategy for the business

exp_summary10: *Designed and built several IT data centers for company use as well as purpose built ones for customers *Mentored , coached and developed a high performance team which evolved from establishing their credibility in managing internal IT services and then unleashing their talent on client engagements *Handled the role of a IT Security manager for a technology services client, coordinated the business unit's security requirements and created policies , standards, procedures for the organization's IT Security function *Handled the IT services function for a key business division including provisioning of user services, office & data center design & operations, and service level management *Security Architecture design, firewall implementation, IDS and anti-virus roll out *Facilitated the transformation the employee performance management process and introduced a quarterly performance appraisal and development system, as a process champion

summary: Professional Experience Summary: •16+ years experience in Software Development, Pre and Post Si Validation, Management and architecting solutions. •Current Job: Senior Manager, ASIC Development Engineering at Western Digital Corporation, Bangalore •Worked on site multiple times and worked with and coordinated cross geographical teams. Worked on multiple SoCs. •	I aim for innovation and have filed 4 US Patents and published 4 papers in international IEEE conferences. One of my patents has completed the process at the US PTO to be granted. •	From scratch development of new solutions including Bootloaders, BSP, Linux bring up on multiple platforms and processors, Validation Framework architecture, Device drivers(Network and storage) design and development, Fast Data path drivers for SoCs and custom firmware for USB 2.0-EHCI,OTG,SCSI, PCI, PCI-e, NAS, SDIO, SPI, I2C,GPIO, IR, IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n, GigEthernet, Layer 2, Layer 3 Protocols (VLAN, RSTP etc.) RGMII,SGMII and Wake on LAN. •	Strong experience in Custom device driver design and development, Pre-Si and Post-Si Validation, Sillicon Bringup, Porting and optimizing Linux (SMP and AMP) Kernel and drivers, implementing Multi-threading and synchronization in Multi-Core environment. •Have been Leading/Managing/mentoring teams of more than 3 from Dec 2004. Specialties: Working through time, resource and financial crunches to deliver satisfying solutions which can be marketed in time. To cut across lack of information and equipment and to provide innovative workarounds. To deliver with a team in a high pressure situation.

linkedin_given_recommendations: last_name:-R, name:-Lekshmi R, date_and_relationship:-2016-11-21 11:41:58, Rajeev managed Lekshmi, created_date:-2016-11-21 11:41:58, summary:-Lekshmi was one of the best campus recruits I had taken from her college. She worked in my team for 1.5 years. She is very sharp in her programming skills. She was the main go to person in the team for automation with Perl, python and VB scripts. She came up with many indegeneous approaches in solving our automation issues and brought about statistical analysis of our code. I have always seen her to pursue the best coding standards and never compromise on quality and optimization. She showed a lot of expertise and ingenuity in Perl and Django Python in developing data analysis tools. She has a very sharp learning curve and a lot of potential. Very well composed person with a lot of respect from her peers in the team. Good team coordinator. I lost her due to relocation but would never hesitate in hiring her back. I wish her the best in her career ahead., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAA1yAAAAJGZmMWE2ZjJjLTU5OTktNDQ1ZS1iNDlkLTU3YWYxNjA1MmU2YQ.jpg, profile_member_id:-321448836, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/lekshmi-r/, recommendation_id:-582316665 <> last_name:-Desai, name:-Vishal Desai, date_and_relationship:-2014-02-12 04:45:09, Rajeev senior than Vishal, created_date:-2014-02-12 04:45:09, summary:-I worked very closely with Vishal for more than a Year on Developing Full chip Concurrency Post-Sillicon Validation for Intel's Medfield and Next Gen Application Processors. Vishal has excellent Knowledge of Embedded C, and eCos RTOS that we used as a test platform. We worked to-gether in integrating test cases to create a Full chip stress test platform. He is a fast learner and takes full ownership of the work. He has very good debugging skills and good knowledge of SoC architecture and multi-threading. I'm expecting him to grow as a great embedded engineer for embedded system development & silicon validation as his work experience and knowledge accumulates., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/1f1/197/21ef0ae.jpg, profile_member_id:-123656289, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/vshal/, recommendation_id:-525185921 <> last_name:-Sharma, name:-Shailender Sharma, date_and_relationship:-2010-03-07 06:55:02, Rajeev senior than Shailender, created_date:-2010-03-07 06:55:02, summary:-Shailender is one of the few mid-level experianced programmers I have met in my career who had the golden chance to go through two complete product cycles onsite with the customer, in wi-fi with embedded linux, right from conception of the idea, design (higher and lower levels), development from scratch, to QA and support. He is very good in development, coding and debugging drivers and optimizing code for good benchmark numbers. I would surely recomend him as a senior software engineer in Linux Device Drivers., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/034/256/11a8af5.jpg, profile_member_id:-46964670, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/shailendersharma/, recommendation_id:-17048139 <> last_name:-Piloyan, name:-Ara Piloyan, date_and_relationship:-2008-06-23 07:18:05, worked in different companies, created_date:-2008-06-23 07:18:05, summary:-Ara, is one of the rare people who have excellent talent and capabilities in both the technical and management verticals. A platform of learning for all budding entrepreneurs on the lines of `mistakes that can be avoided or things to lookout for... --Kanchana Dwarakanath & Ravindra Pande <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=30219&goback=, group_name:-Semiconductor Professional's Group, no_of_members:-115714, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/2/000/000/027/112707e.jpg, group_id:-30219, group_description:-This group welcomes engineers, managers, and recruiters who are involved in all areas related to semiconductor, including fabrication, process, modeling, design, measurement, of device, integrated electronic circuits, integrated photonics and optioelectronics, etc. "Semicon - largest network of Semiconductor professionals" If you write in the group, please read and follow the "Group Rules", which can be found in "Group Rules" tab. Here are some qualifications you need to meet in order to join this group: 1. Your first name has to be real or nickname, last name should be real; you shall not use fake name (e.g., using company name as your name); 2. Connection shall be equal or more than 3; this is to ensure you are a real person; 3. Profile shall contain enough information, including education and/or work, and they should have some relationship with this group, either current or past, e.g., Engineering (Electrical, Computer, etc), Physics, Math, Engineering Management, Engineering Marketing, etc; It is fine not to provide the name of employers for privacy consideration. However, enough information about past education and employment is needed. 4. If possible, the requester should include a link to his/her current employer website. Notice that any broken links or that direct to a completely different site will delay or deny the request to join the group. The requests to join are processed in sequence. Due to high volume of requests, and our strict policy to review each applicant's qualifications, the approval process can take a couple of weeks, up to 2 months. If you feel that you meet the qualifications to join, but are removed or rejected, please contact all the managers of this group, through LinkedIn mail (Emails are usually filtered out due to unknown users). The one taking care of your case may respond to you. However, for those who apparently do not meet the qualifications (e.g., using fake name), the managers will not respond. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=76373&goback=, group_name:-Google Android, no_of_members:-230772, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/01f/3e7/313a8bb.png, group_id:-76373, group_description:-This group is independent from Google. linkedin_publications: publication_title:-Design and optimization of EDFAs for simultaneous amplification of WDM signals in both C & L bands using fiber Bragg gratings, publication_url:-http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/application/enterprise/entconfirmation.jsp?arnumber=1273236, publisher:-IEEE 10.1109/TENCON.2003.1273236, publication_description:-Analysis and optimized designs of EDFAs that overcome the problems faced while amplifying WDM signals consisting of both C and L band signals are presented. Their configurations and operation in overcoming the problems faced by using fiber Bragg gratings (FBGs) are presented. Parameters and equations along with numerical calculations and simulated results are provided. Comparison is provided based on various aspects. Finally, it is shown that the bidirectional FBG-EDFA configuration offers the best performance in comparison to other designs., publication_date:-2003-10-15 <> publication_title:-Link control in realizing high Band width Bi-directional simultaneous amplification of C & L band WDM Signals in Ultrahigh Band width and speed metropolitan Optical Networks, publisher:-IEEE ACE 2003, publication_description:-A novel method of link control is proposed using a simple algorithm, which has very short response time and very simple circuitry. The method is imposed on a newly designed EDFA capable of simultaneously amplifying WDM signals of both C & L bands., publication_date:-2003-12-12 <> publication_title:-Design & Optimization of EDFAs for Simultaneous amplification of C & L bands using FBGs, publisher:-IEEE Transactions-Annual Symposium-2002, publication_description:-Analysis and optimized designs of EDFAs that overcome the problems faced while amplifying WDM signals consisting of both C and L band signals are presented. Their configurations and operation in overcoming the problems faced by using fiber Bragg gratings (FBGs) are presented. Parameters and equations along with numerical calculations and simulated results are provided. Comparison is provided based on various aspects. Finally, it is shown that the bidirectional FBG-EDFA configuration offers the best performance in comparison to other designs., publication_date:-2002-11-15
