exp_title4: Lead Embedded Systems and Si Validation Engineer
exp_summary4: Leading Embedded Systems development and co-ordination across geographies and End to End Si Validation for complex SoCs across platforms and emulators on eCos, Linux and low level firmware. Product Atom Medfield SoC (all SKUs) Hyperthreading enabled 32 nm (code name: Penwell) o Lead the Full Chip Concurrency Validation content development, execution and debug for the last 3 steppings of Sillicon on 3 different SKUs. Took the product to Production Release. o	Co-Architected the custom Feature Injected SoC Test (FIST) environment built on eCos used across AVE(Atom Validation Engineering. o	Integrated multiple modules graphics, USB, HDMI ported from Intel SVOS-Linux into the FIST framework to achieve Full Chip Concurrency. Enhance the content for PVT and Power and Performance teams. •	Product Atom Merrifield SoC (all SKUs) 22nm (code name: Tangier) o	Content Framework architect for the custom Feature Injected SoC Test (FIST) environment for the project based on which all Validation is being done. o	I owned the Post Si Validation, Protocol Compliance for all Low Speed Peripherals on this SoC (10 instances of I2C, 7 instances of SSP and SPI, 125 GPIO) and MIPI-PTI debug port. I lead a team of 3 in the Post-Si Validation and debug for Low Speed Peripherals and MIPI-PTI. o	Responsible for Leading the test content development, integration, enhancement, review, release, execution and first level debug for Full Chip System Validation of Atom SoCs.
exp_title5: Senior Embedded Systems development & Si Validation Engineer
exp_summary5: End to end Pre-Sillicon and Post Sillicon Validation of High end multi core SOCs on multiple Hardware platforms such as emulators(Palladium) and Carbon models and software platforms such as U-Boot, Linux and our proprietary BIOS. I am responsible for bringing up each of the platforms on the RTL and sillicon; architecting/coding drivers for multiple interfaces such as GigE, USB, SDIO, SATA etc. (at both boot loader and Linux levels) required for stress testing the end solutions such as NAS, Home Gateway, Wireless Access Point etc. This also includes running High availability apps to stress test the Cores and Cache and Architecting power management solutions in Multi-core Cloud computing framework.
exp_summary6: Strategic Consulting, including BSP and Linux Device Driver design, development and debugging for 802.11n AP and STA newly taped out SOCs. Full project life cycle involvement for Generic platform code bringup for different SKUs(under Gen5 MIMO chipset) and MAC level debugging for Gen4 MIMO chipset. Development of optimal data path Linux Device driver design across multiple interfaces such as 802.11n, PCI-e and Gig-Ethernet) for maximum throughput for high availability end solutions like Wi-Fi Gateways and HD-Video streaming. Implementation of low level bridges and IGMP snooping for the same.
exp_summary7: Managing the Software Team, architecting solutions, recruiting as per recruiments, Leading and Mentoring mid level experienced professionals in my team and directly managing and Handling diffrent projects and delivery such as: • Client:NXP- Wifi over SDIO • Client: Telesoft- Managed and mentored a team of 4 Engineers for the VoiceXML Conformance testing on the Telesoft OKEFORD Router. •Client: Validity Sensors- Key contributor for the DRM solutions in the Falcon chipset(2 tapeouts). FPGA validation and firmware/driver development in Non-OS platform for USB and SPI and realizing Open SSL( RSA, AES and SHA drivers). •Architected/managed PKCS#11 DRM solution. Managed/Mentored a team of 7. Custom USB and SPI host driver development on Linux 2.6.18 kernel run on a PXA 310 Marvell litteton board for the Secure SOC Target board for realizing a complete PKCS#11 DRM solution. Reuse of RSA, AES and SHA drivers that were previously developed to put together a DRM solution.
exp_summary8: Module lead (component owner) for the PCI-e and Gigabit Ethernet components. There were 6 other Sw. Engineers and Sr. Sw. Engineers to whom I distributed the workload other than myself for the Line Items (projects) and defects related to these components. I was also involved in developing Generic AIX Device Driver models.
exp_summary9: •	WiFi Implementation: Description: Generation/ implementing, debugging and enhancing the MAC software for various 802.11 specs and different MAC architectures and chipsets of Conexant Systems Inc. This involved work both at the AP and client level. This was done with C coding with the help of various GCC cross compilers.
exp_summary10: •	BIOS design & customization: Description:This involved x86 Assembly & C level coding for customizing the Phoenix BIOS for various customer boards with different CPUs.
exp_summary11: •	Network Centric Computing using Thin Clients: Description: Generation, debugging & enhancements of application & driver components for Thin Clients using Windows CE. Configuring & implementing network centric computing using DHCP,TFTP, PXE, (MS)RDP, (Citrix) ICA etc. This includes Device drivers for various peripherals like USB, PCI, Printers, Modems, Mass storage & HID and application debugging for IE 6.0, VPN, RDP 5.5 etc.
exp_summary12: All projects were Embeddded systems related & most of them focused on from scratch development of USB-Host/Device & OTG ASIC and support firmware . I was also on a deputation to “Mistral software” for their project with TI to port USB Mass Storage Driver and firmware.
exp_summary13: •	Worked as Project Asst. under Assnt.Prof. T.Srinivas in ECE-Indian Institute of Science (IISc)-Bangalore from Dec 2001 to Jan 2004(2.3 yrs.) under National Program for Smart Materials (NPSM) sponsored MOEMS pressure Sensor project. •	This project involved Hardware & Firmware development for Optical Networks & MEMS systems. Trained & experienced in working in Cleanrooms with a good knowledge about fabrication techniques, design, analysis & testing of Embedded Systems, MEMS and Optical Workbenches. •	Completed DWDM Optical network management at PHY layer Project using individually designed EDFA & Intel 8051 board in IISc.Completed Designing & Optimization of Multi-band Optical Amplifiers project in IISc. •	Highly capable in testing & troubleshooting in various Communication Systems (Optical-SONET, DWDM; Wireless).

For more in depth intelligence and tools related to new developments in Martech please join our dedicated community: www.martechshared.com <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=1107227&goback=, group_name:-The Nautical Institute, no_of_members:-24751, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/014/052/01d41b9.png, group_id:-1107227, group_description:-The Nautical Institute is the international representative body for maritime professionals and others with an interest in nautical matters. We provide a wide range of services to enhance the professional standing and knowledge of members who are drawn from all sectors of the maritime world. Our work is available to the whole industry to help improve the safety and efficiency of shipping. Our monthly journal Seaways, books, web services and projects help to provide real solutions to problems facing the industry and provide mariners' input to decision makers internationally and nationally. Our aim is to provide the strongest possible professional focus, dedicated to improving standards of those in control of seagoing craft, while maintaining the Institute as an international centre of nautical excellence. The formation of Nautical Institute Branches and other groupings is actively encouraged. The Nautical Institute is a thriving international professional body for qualified mariners – with over 40 branches worldwide and members in over 110 countries. Nautical Institute membership is open to all nationalities - in grades appropriate to qualifications. The benefits of joining the Institute are many and include professional recognition, receipt of regular and up-to-date information and, through Seaways, discounts on Nautical Institute publications, conferences, seminars, etc. Visit our website for a membership form. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=1773416&goback=, group_name:-Dynamic Positioning Operators, no_of_members:-13330, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/2/000/01a/0d8/3734b38.png, group_id:-1773416, group_description:-For offshore oil and gas, navy, mariners, manufacturers and maritime service providers with an interest in Dynamic Positioning systems. With unrivalled access to industry leaders, Lloyd’s List and Lloyd's List Containers sets the scene for all industry stakeholders. Content ranges from data-driven analyses of the industry’s future supply and demand position and capacity deployment, to exclusive profiles that throw light on what drives those who are shaping the industry. With container shipping supply and demand so unpredictable, you need the most accurate data and analysis on global container trades available. exp_summary1: As Regional Managing Director, Eastern Hemisphere of Maersk Training Group, I am responsible for starting up centres across Asia and Middle East in the near term and growing business across Africa and Australia area. The focus is to ensure that we are able to deliver our entire portfolio of training across Oil and Gas, Maritime and Wind industry in the region.
exp_summary2: Responsible for new business delivery and development, Organisational mapping & talent development. Also responsible for supporting and growing the UK business overall across Aberdeen and Newcastle. From April to December 2012 had dual responsibility as Managing Director for Maersk Training Newcastle along with the Global Business Development role.
exp_summary3: From April to December headed and successfully turned around the company. Managed the start up phase of a challenging new project along with consolidating the existing business and doubled the revenue.
exp_summary4: Maersk Training Centre, part of the A.P.Moller - Maersk Group is focused on providing training in Martime and people skill related areas.
exp_summary5: As Head of India business, managed the people, the centre, its strategy and its business development; interfacing with internal and external stakeholders to positively impact the centre’s top and bottom-lines. Achieved turnaround of the business within a year from loss making and single customer dependency to a very profitable broad based robust business. Since the turnaround and 2+ years later it continues to be the most profitable (% wise) and the highest return on capital invested within the Group.
exp_company_name6: Norfolkline part of A. P. Moller Maersk Group
exp_title6: Executive Assistant to CEO and project coordinator
exp_summary6: As Executive assistant to CEO and project Coordinator was involved with Senior management, Strategy, Board reporting, special projects including communication, branding and marketing.
exp_summary7: MISE batch 2004-2006. ( for more details about the MISE program please refer to www.mise.edu) Graduated in september 2006 from the program.During the course of the program worked in Chennai, Delhi and Cochin for Maersk Line and Maersk Logistics.
exp_company_name11: ICICI Prudential Life Insurance Company Limited
exp_summary11: Was responsible for selling life insurance through the bancassurance channel by leveraging the network of 5 bank branches in the city.
exp_summary12: Headed the chennai business of Showblitz an entrepreneur driven event management company. Built the business from zero customers to a broad based set of customers across industries and managed to win against corporate giants and ad companies by focussing on cost effective and innovative solutions for customers. This was a people and asset lite but networking intensive business.

name: Saravana Praveen Palanisamy
headline: Country HR Leader at HP
summary: HR Generalist with 14+ Yrs of hands-on experience in the entire employee life cycle (recruitment to retirement) and HR functions like PMS, Competency Mapping, Mobility/allocation, OD interventions, Policies and Procedures, Legal and Statutory Compliance etc... Has been in the mid management role since 2008, managing up to 1800 workforce and contract staff’s across locations. Alumni of IIM, Bangalore and Microsoft Certified MS-Office Specialist. Possess excellent thinking & action cluster skills backed with high energy level, drive, enthusiasm to interact with people and is passionate for excellence in the field of HRM.

name: Raj Parameswaran
headline: Digital Enterprise - Consulting | Application Services | Big Data & Analytics | Mobile | IoT | Cloud Sales Leader
summary: Accomplished Information Technology sales and business development leader in Banking, Financial Services, Insurance, Manufacturing, Automotive and Retail sectors. Twenty years’ global experience with unique combination of sales, P&L management, delivery, operations and practice excellence. Led customer and profit centric business transformation leveraging core processes, capabilities and assets, track-record leading organizations from vision through execution. Presently responsible for sales and client engagements in North America for CSS Corp. Prior positions include driving Digital Enterprise services sales in the North East market for a global IT service provider, new business development in the Banking and Capital Markets sector for leading specialist in software quality services; running new business development and managing Insurance portfolio; Strategic Business Head, Americas - Banking and Financial Services managing Sales, Delivery, Operations and Quality. Early career as Business Solutions Center Head, Global Retail Banking Services and Global Data Services for Financial Technology company; Head, Sales and Services Delivery, Continental Europe and India in banking and capital markets; seasoned Account Executive in North America and Europe managing multiple banking customers and Management Consultant for a Big 3 specialized in Insurance products.

linkedin_given_recommendations: last_name:-Kaulshi, name:-Anupam Kaulshi, date_and_relationship:-2015-06-07 15:40:55, Raj senior than Anupam, created_date:-2015-06-07 15:40:55, summary:-I am writing to recommend the services of Anupam. I know Anupam for more than a decade from Capgemini days. I recall he built the UserExperience practice in Kanbay/Capgemini days all by himself and was well recognized by BFS customers and internal executives. His knowledge and attention to detail have aided in keeping our business on track during many RFPs, client demos and execution. Further, Anupam worked with me closely during Polaris days where he was instrumental in winning a multi-million dollar deal on portal based solution. He is not only thorough, but also easy to work with, and always willing to take the time to discuss my concerns and respond to questions. name: Maju Sukumaran
headline: Operational Excellence Consultant - Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt / Enterprise AGILE Transformation Coach
summary: A Business Excellence Consulting professional possessing Bachelor degree in Engineering and 18 Years of experience in Business consulting, Business administration and project management. Certified Lean Master, Design for Lean Six Sigma professional, Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt and Project Manager with excellent business acumen and interpersonal skills Possesses hands-on experience in deploying Lean Six Sigma using both Kaizen and DEDIC frameworks and also experienced in designing customized continuous improvement deployment framework and methodology and Lean Six Sigma training materials.Demonstrated high level of expertise in various tools like Value Stream mapping, Voice of Customer, 5S, Just in time, SMED, Set up reduction, JIDOKA, POKA YOKE, KANBAN, FMEA, MSA etc. Experienced with deploying HOSHIN KANRI, the Lean based Policy deployment framework and developing customized training materials for the same. Currently working as a Process Improvement Consultant and Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt for 3i Infotech Inc., headquartered at Edison, NJ Worked as project manager with IBM global services in application management services Worked as Strategic Consultant - Lean & Six Sigma, with IBM - Global business services at New Jersey, USA. Worked as Lead Consultant - Lean and Operational excellence at a business consulting company from India Worked as a director for Indian- operations and Sr. consultant in another strategic consulting firm from the US, offering specialized improvement consulting services based on Lean Worked as General Manager and head of India operations for another US management consulting firm, offering services and solutions in quality systems and Six Sigma Worked with major business houses like Godrej, Mettler Toledo and ATCO Specialties: IBM Certified Lean Master Certified Design for Lean Sigma professional.

linkedin_given_recommendations: last_name:-Jha, name:-Sanjeev Jha, date_and_relationship:-2012-11-15 16:23:06, worked in same group, created_date:-2012-11-15 16:23:06, summary:-Sanjeev Jha's enthusiasm for work, especially in the continuous improvement area has no equals. His ability to understand the challenges of the business and the environment along with his stake holder management skills, especially from the upper strata, along with his perseverance and knowledge in Lean Six Sigma and continuous improvement makes him an excellent consultant of any customers' choice. I have not seen many consultants, at his young age and with a management background, who are ready to pull their sleeves up and make their hands dirty right from day one. But Sanjeev is an exception. He is ready to go to any extend and work to any compelling schedule to get the committed / desired results. More than all of this he is great human being and a friend whom you can trust. People are Idea Generators. People have the intelligence and the ability to fully participate in the improvement process. Instead of management always telling people what to do, through Quick and Easy Kaizen managers let their employees know what they want to accomplish and then simply ask the workers "What do you think?" "How would you improve customer service?" How would you improve quality and safety?" A new dynamic takes place as people are empowered to serve themselves and their customers. The world is shrinking and becoming more competitive. Internet and modern technology requires companies to harness all of their resources. People have a fundamental right to human dignity and to enhance their human value. Quick and Easy Kaizen is a process where the worker is asked to participate in the improvement process through identifying problems and coming up with simple solutions that they themselves can implement. It is a very powerful motivator and it works! exp_title1: Lead Consultant - Operational Excellence (Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt / Ent. Agile Coach) )
exp_title2: Opoerational Excellence Consultant -Lean Six Sigma Master Black Belt / AGILE Coach
exp_summary2: Working as Business Process Consultant at 3i Infotech, helping the company and its clients improve their efficiency and productivity deploying Continuous Improvement methodologies predominantly using Lean Six Six Sigma and AGILE tools and techniques. Delivered more than 6 projects so far having a gross financial impact of more than USD 20 M
exp_summary3: Was the Lean Six Sigma deployment lead for IBM Global Business Service North America Communication sector. In this role he oversaw and managed the Lean Six Sigma continuous improvement deployment for the entire portfolio of clients from telecom, media & entertainment and energy & utilities industrial segments. Delivered 15 Lean Six Sigma based Continuous Process Improvement Projects having financial impacts of several Million US Dollars. Initiated and established Lean Six Sigma based continuous improvement programs in IBM Global delivery centers in Philippines, China and Brazil. Was responsible for training and mentoring the local team members on the IBM continuous improvement methodology and initializing and mobilizing the first few projects. Was also a member of the task force, which was responsible for designing the deployment frame work and developing the IBM approach to Lean Six Sigma continuous improvement program and developing future managers who can deliver using these methodologies and methods
exp_title4: Lead Consultant - Lean and Operational excellence
exp_summary4: Was responsible for leading the team in mentoring and hand holding various clients predominantly based on Lean, Lean Six Sigma, TPS and Break though Supplier development
exp_summary5: Was responsible for the end of end delivery of Lean based business transformation projects and programs for few clients including fortune 500 and famous brand names.
exp_summary6: www.omnex.com
exp_summary8: Business development for Photo finishing equipments and consumables

SAP HANA is now on Fast-Track as the SME enterprises start their migration to HANA. SAP HANA is estimated to be a $300 billion opportunity from 2015 to 2025. Join this group to network about SAP HANA developments and building the Digital Core for your Digital Enterprise. At the center of Digitization is Informatics. This evolved from Reports to Analytics to Informatics. SAP HANA is the hyper-converge platform for all your The Big-5 enterprise bets, i.e. [1] Informatics, [2] Big-Data; [3] Cloud; [4] Digitization or IoT; and [5] Mobility. HANA is exceptional in the most critical of all the Big-5 bets- Contextual Informatics. The HANA Run Simple strategy has consistently mitigated necessary complexities with hyper-fast computing. name: Manickavel Arumugam
headline: Project Management Consultant | Trainer | Blogger
summary: Highlights: ✪ About 23 years of experience in construction, with emphasis on Project Management & Site Control; more than 12 years in Underground Metro Stations/ Cut & Cover Tunnels/ LRT. Specialties: ✪ Underground Metro/ MRT (Mass Rapid Transit) stations, ✪ Services Tunnel, ✪ Deep excavation and basement construction, ✪ Temporary Earth Retaining Structures, ✪ Precast and Prestressed components fabrication and erection, ✪ Geotechnical Instrumentation Major Projects: ✪ Contract UGC-03, Mumbai Metro Rail Line 3, India ✪ Contract UAA-01, Chennai Metro Rail Project Phase 1, India ✪ Contract C856, Circle Line MRT Stage 4 & 5, Singapore ✪ Contract C705, North East Line MRT, Singapore ✪ Common Services Tunnel (CST) Phase 1B & 2, Singapore ✪ Common Services Tunnel (CST) Phase 3B, Singapore ✪ Rock Mole Phase 1, Singapore Professional Accreditations/ Certifications ✪ Professional Engineer (India) ✪ Certified Project Management Professional (PMP) ✪ Certified Risk Management Professional (PMI-RMP) ✪ Certified QMS Auditor/ Lead Auditor (based on ISO 9001:2015 Standard) ✪ Accredited Civil/ Structural Resident Engineer (Singapore) ✪ Chartered Engineer (India) Skills: ✪ Exceptional listener and communicator who effectively conveys information verbally and in writing ✪ Good proficiency in MS-Office tools; able to extract valuable information from data and present it to the stakeholders in the form of reports or presentations ✪ Flexible team player; able to work cooperatively with others to achieve shared goals ✪ Able to work independently, with minimal supervision

exp_summary1: ◘ 13 & 14 May 2016: Training Programme on "Effective Project Management" at Motherson Automotive Technologies and Engineering, Sriperumbudur on behalf of TAC House, New Delhi ◘ 22 Mar 2016: Keynote address on "Underground construction - Possibilities and Challenges" & Jury for the paper presentation; at the National level technical symposium "Hoover 16", held at T.J.S Engineering College, Chennai ◘ 03 Mar 2016: Guest Lecture on "Scope for Civil Engineers" at Surya Polytechnic College, Vikiravandi ◘ 04 Sep 2015: Guest Lecture on "Construction of Underground Structures & Related Challenges"​ at the Industrial Seminar for M. Tech (Construction Management) students at IIT Madras. ◘ 11 Jul 2015: Guest Lecture on "Underground Structures and Execution Techniques"​ at Sona College of Technology, Salem ◘ 25 Apr 2015: Invited Speaker on the theme "Case Studies and Latest Developments in Construction of Diaphragm Walls for Deep Basements in Urban Environment"​ at the National workshop "Pile Foundations – Advances in Design and Construction Practices"​ conducted by Deep Foundations Institute (DFI) of India and Indian Geotechnical Society at Bhubaneswar ◘ 20 Sep 2014: Keynote Lecture on "Lessons to be learned from Nicoll Highway Collapse in Singapore"​.at the Conference on "Deep Foundation Technologies for Infrastructure Development in India 2014"​ conducted by Deep Foundations Institute (DFI) of India, IIT Delhi, Indian Geotechnical Society (IGS) Delhi Chapter and Construction Industry Development Council (CIDC) at IIT Delhi ◘ 26 Jul 2014: Guest lecture on "Job Opportunities in Civil Engineering and Project Management System"​ at Knowledge Institute of Technology, Salem ◘ 21 Jun 2014: Guest lecture on "Diaphragm Wall Construction - Site Planning & Control"​ at L&T Construction, Chennai ◘ 22 Mar 2013: Training programme on "Diaphragm wall - Construction aspects"​ at Chennai ◘ Chennai Metro Rail awareness programme at Madras Gymkhana Club & Bharathi Women's College, Chennai
exp_summary2: Project: UGC-03 Contract, Mumbai Metro Rail Line 3, India: The work includes construction of 5 underground stations, namely Mumbai Central, Mahalaxmi, Science Museum, Acharya Atre Chowk and Worli. The Contract also includes 3645m of twin TBM tunnels.
exp_summary3: - Helping the organization to improve their project management processes - Prepared the format for method statements and helping the execution team to develop method statements for all critical works - Prepared the three week rolling programme and helping the team in preparing and implementing the programme
exp_summary4: Project: UAA-01 Contract, Chennai Metro Rail Project Phase 1, India: ◘ Managing the construction of stations/ cut & cover portion of Underground Contract UAA-01, which includes five underground stations and an access shaft ◘ Leading a team of 12 Engineers; responsible for managing scope, time, quality control and safety; assisted the Employer’s Representative in administration of the Contract ◘ Managed the following works: ✔ Soil investigation, Utilities investigation/ diversion works, Tree felling, Traffic diversions ✔ Diaphragm walls, Contiguous Bored Piles, Jet Grouting, Plunge columns ✔ Deep excavation, Temporary strutting ✔ Roof, concourse & base slabs; Permanent Columns, Internal walls, Platform walls & slabs, Overhead Trackway Exhaust (OTE) ducts ✔ Employed both top-down & bottom-up construction methods ◘ Successfully completed ✔ Launching shaft at May Day Park to launch four TBMs, two towards Government Estate and two towards Chennai Central ✔ Launching shaft at Washermanpet to launch two TBMs towards Mannadi ✔ Receiving shaft at Egmore to receive two TBMs from Nehru Park ✔ Base slab at High Court to receive two TBMs from Mannadi
exp_summary5: ◘ Responsible for project management, quality control and safety management ◘ Involved in the construction of Temporary Earth Retaining Structures (TERS) including soldier/ sheet pile walls, diaphragm walls, contiguous bored piles, jet grouting works, king post installation, bored piles and strutting works ◘ Supervised the construction of permanent tunnel structure, including reinforcement fabrication, M&E provisions and concreting activities ◘ Reviewed and monitored the instrumentation readings against the design predictions and the set review levels ◘ Co-ordinated with the permanent works consultant/ temporary works consultant/ independent checker/ main contractor/ instrumentation contractor/ adjacent contractors ◘ Monitored the progress of works relative to the approved baseline and subsequent recovery programmes
exp_summary6: Project: LTA Circle Line MRT Stage 5 - C856, Contract value of S$335 million ◘ Responsible for project management, quality control and safety management ◘ Involved in the construction of diaphragm walls, soldier/ sheet pile walls, bored piles, soil mix piles, jet grouting works, king post/ deck post installation, decking works and traffic diversions ◘ Reviewed the instrumentation readings and monitored the adjacent structures against movement caused from the construction works ◘ Co-ordinated with the Design Management Team/ Consultant/ Contractor in matters related to design/ technical submissions ◘ Monitored the progress of works relative to the approved baseline and subsequent recovery programmes ◘ Verified the progress payment submitted by contractors
exp_summary7: ◘ Taught various engineering subjects for students of Civil Engineering Department and Electrical & Electronics Department ◘ Served as Class Counsellor for the Civil Engineering students ◘ Served as Civil Engineering Department Representative at the Committee for the Implementation and Monitoring of ISO 9000 Quality Management System ◘ Managed the Civil Engineering Department Library ◘ Organized educational tours for Civil Engineering students
exp_summary8: ◘ Involved in Precast components Production Planning, Scheduling, Updating & Monitoring the project progress ◘ The precast components included ✔ columns, ✔ beams, ✔ prestressed slabs, ✔ post-tensioned beams, ✔ façade, ✔ volumetric components like house-hold shelters, components for lift upgrading projects and components for main upgrading projects, ✔ stair flights ◘ Handled Materials Requirement Planning for projects, including procurement of steel moulds ◘ Co-ordinated with Main-contractors for delivery planning and progress updates ◘ Has been involved in verifying & certifying sub-contractor works and in preparing interim progress payment applications to clients ◘ Has been a member of ISO 9000 Quality Management System Steering Committee and played an important role in setting up the QMS system ◘ Developed a production database using MS-Access, which is used for updating the production/ delivery records. The database is used for generating relevant production/ delivery status reports.

name: Sanjay Pinto
headline: Lawyer I Columnist I Author I Public Speaker I Mentor - Silver Tongue Academy I Former Resident Editor - NDTV 24x7
summary: MY JOURNEY FROM THE NEWS ROOM TO THE COURT ROOM... Before donning the robes as a lawyer in the Madras High Court where I specialise in Media, Criminal, Constitutional, Corporate, Arbitration & Consumer Cases representing celebrity clients, I was the face of NDTV in South India as the Bureau Chief & Resident Editor of NDTV 24x7 & the Executive Editor of NDTV Hindu. During my stint with NDTV 24x7, I interviewed Presidents & Prime Ministers, Chief Ministers & Governors, Diplomats, Bureaucrats, International Sportspersons, Film Stars & covered 4 Parliamentary Elections, 4 Assembly Polls, Natural Disasters, Bomb Blasts,Assassination Attempts,Sensational Arrests & Court Trials, Narcotics Smuggling & Sting Operations, some of which resulted in CBI probes. I also anchored Prime Time News Bulletins like Southern Edition, Good Morning Chennai & Lunchtime News. At NDTV Hindu, I spearheaded the telecast of 17 news bulletins a day & hosted shows like 'Chennai Speaks Out', 'Corridors of Power', 'Voice of Chennai', 'The Big Question' & 'Enterprising Entrepreneurs'. I have straddled every form of the media - TV, Print, Radio & Online. I wear many hats - as a Columnist for Deccan Chronicle & Ritz, Moderator of Shows on Chennai Live 104.8 FM, Author of the Bestselling Books ‘Speakers Are Made Not Born’ & 'Justice For All', Mentor of the Silver Tongue Academy Resource & Covenant Media. I'm a former National Debating Champion with a record 106 victories in inter-collegiate debates. Having won landmark cases in Court, I was selected by the US Govt to represent India in the International Visitors Leadership Program (IVLP) on the 'Rule of Law & Judicial Reforms' in Feb'14 in the U.S.A. A Moderator at Panel Discussions,I'm a regular speaker on prime time debates on news channels. I'm the recipient of the Rotary 'Vocational Excellence Award' & the Rotary 'For The Sake Of Honour' award for my work in Broadcast Journalism & Law.

linkedin_given_recommendations: last_name:-Ayer, name:-Sriram Ayer, date_and_relationship:-2017-10-13 12:11:55, worked in different groups, created_date:-2017-10-13 12:11:55, summary:-Seldom do we come across a man of letters, ideas and action. But then Sriram Ayer, quite like the title of that old Tamil hit film 'Aayirathil Oruvan' (meaning "One In A Thousand") is such a multi-faceted and versatile personality, who is sought after by business tycoons, political leaders and the highest echelons in the bureaucracy for his acumen and perspective. Be it sniffing out business opportunities or forging strategic partnerships or feeling the pulse of voters at election time, or lending his expertise in cyber security, Sriram has been the most reliable and credible 'Go To' professional in South India with his footprint overseas. Having known him for more than two decades, right from his Loyola College years, in my capacity as a Television Journalist & Editor at NDTV and later as a Lawyer, Columnist & Author, he has always struck me as an exceptionally brilliant person from an eminent family who earned his spurs on his own steam. It would be no exaggeration to call him a walking encyclopedia with an eye for detail, an ear to the ground and a nose for innovation. On the personal front, he has been a dear friend whom I can always count on. True to its name - 'Launchpad Ventures', Sriram's brainchild is poised to give your business or investment or tie up, not just a fillip but the Midas Touch. I wish Sriram the best - in his quest to be all that he can be., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAIA_wDGAAAAAQAAAAAAAAwRAAAAJGNlN2FjZDU5LTVmZDItNGEwZS1hOGE1LWNhZjU0MGMzNTI5Nw.jpg, profile_member_id:-603335969, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/sriram-ayer/, recommendation_id:-593667375 <> last_name:-Shetty, name:-Sucheta Shetty, date_and_relationship:-2013-07-02 12:31:42, worked in different companies, created_date:-2013-07-02 12:31:42, summary:-Sucheta Shetty – As I Know Her. When ‘People’ top your list of interests, you’re probably cut out to be a good politician or a HR professional! Sucheta Shetty chose the challenge of proving that the work place can be a place for happy campers sans ‘office politics’! In India Inc where the very mention of ‘HR’ can sometimes conjure up a fear psychosis of sorts and even have cynics hurl sobriquets like ‘the dirty tricks department’, this Vice President - HR of TAKE Solutions, comes across as an affable leader who is known to lead by example. The HR industry grapevine has it that this soft spoken head honcho’s penchant for “employee engagement and best practices” has made her quite the “darling of her team” and a respected and much sought after expert. Whether it is scouting for the right talent or keeping the flock together by making her colleagues feel part of the furniture; what with attrition shooting up like the proverbial Jack’s beanstalk, Sucheta goes about her business in an inimitable style and with considerable professional elan. A few months ago, Sucheta was a panelist on one of my talk shows. More than her intellectual prowess and mastery of the HR related subject or her credibility or her quick witted repartees, what struck me was her genuine warmth and mild mannered, genteel nature that provoked me to send her this text message after the show “sometimes when you meet people for the first time, you feel like you’ve met them before!” I later guessed that her inter personal skills and the immense value she places in human resources probably stem from the Advaita philosophy – ‘there is divinity in everyone’, gleaned from the spiritual books that she is an avid reader of. A little birdie reveals that Sucheta’s style of functioning is a reflection of the dictum ‘it’s not your position but your disposition that matters’. No wonder she is looked up to as a role model and not a ‘boss’. Here’s hoping she never changes! SANJAY PINTO Advocate, Columnist – The Hindu & Tehelka, Former NDTV Resident Editor, Author, Communications Mentor & Talk Show Host., profile_member_id:-29169697, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/sucheta-shetty-7419289/, recommendation_id:-48278232 <> last_name:-Chacko, name:-Evelyn Chacko, date_and_relationship:-2012-10-23 07:13:45, Sanjay managed Evelyn, created_date:-2012-10-23 07:13:45, summary:-If NDTV HINDU was Evelyn’s maiden foray into television journalism, it most definitely was not evident. Her hop, skip and jump from college to a 24 hour news room was marked by an incredible degree of screen presence, professionalism and maturity, far beyond her years. Evelyn has been with NDTV HINDU since its inception; her baby steps in the field coinciding with the channel’s; and soon giving way to confident strides. Over the last three years, Evelyn emerged as one of our best anchors. Whether it was feeling the pulse of the youth – through her weekly campus discussion ‘U Special’ or delving deep into contentious issues - like the Uniform Syllabus, Infighting in the Tamil Nadu Congress or the pulls and pressures of forming Team India before the World Cup, Evelyn always came across as a natural television anchor. Not content with merely powdering her nose to anchor from an air conditioned studio, Evelyn earned the spurs on the field as well – covering hard news stories like the swine flu outbreak, music maestro A. R. Rahman’s Hollywood stint, business developments, trends – from the Great Gold Rush to the very latest in real estate and the hospitality boom, not to mention her focus on the Union Budget and tours of US warships. A team player to the core, Evelyn pitched in with the production of our Year Ender Shows (the bloopers too!) and the NDTV HINDU Lifestyle Awards. I wish her the very best – to be all that she can be., profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/6/005/0a5/25d/376b67e.jpg, profile_member_id:-106541013, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/evelyn-chacko-81981b2b/, recommendation_id:-40458784

AIA was established with the aim of facilitating arbitration, mediation and general forms of dispute resolution internationally. AIA has developed into an organization dealing in the private international law field to meet the needs of the fast-growing evolution of dispute resolution within the international community. AIA provides information, training and educational activities to expand the promotion of arbitration and ADR globally by means of securing partnerships with various organizations and parties to get involved in the life of the association. AIA constantly works to develop partnerships in the international realm and to provide the international community of arbitrators and ADR professionals with continuous exposure to the latest international developments, activities and opportunities in the field. AIA continually encourages the participation and contribution of its members in the pursuit of the association’s goals. AIA can assist in the introduction of arbitrators and mediators; however it is not an arbitration institute and does not appoint arbitrators. name: Sekhar VC
headline: Director Software Development at PayPal
summary: * I am Looking for Engineers with 3-8 Years hands - on experience in coding in Java/JEE, Node.js for exciting opportunities at PayPal Chennai. Drop a note if you are interested. -Total experience of 19+ years -Presently associated with Paypal India, Chennai as Director in the payments domain -Engineering payment products ( both real and non real time ) to suit business needs -Products engineered in the Agile - Scrum methodology -Expertise in planning, executing and spearheading various projects in compliance to quality standards. Insightful knowledge of business process analysis and design, application based process reengineering (ABPR), process optimization, cost control and revenue maximization. -Acquires a clear understanding of the industry, technology trends with the distinction of instituting new practices to achieve business excellence at the lowest overall cost. -Proven skills in managing teams to work in sync with the corporate set parameters & motivating them for achieving business and individual goals. -Possess excellent interpersonal, communication and analytical skills with demonstrated abilities in customer relationship management. -PMP certified and hold credit of earning 65 PDUs for the Continuation in Certification. Specialties: C++, VC++, Java, Windows, UNIX, CAA, Open IDEAS, Project Management, Delivery Management, PMP, MBA in Finance

exp_summary1: Leading a team of smart engineers supporting payment products worth $700M in revenue
exp_summary2: Leading the Product Development in for the Payments Domain specifically Card Processing
exp_summary3: Leading the Payments team.
exp_summary4: Managing a team of 20 Engineers and proviiding solutions to Check Out and Credit Card processing Products
exp_summary5: Working as Engineering Manager for PayPal. Responsible for planning & delivery of new features, bug fixing in Payments Domain
exp_summary6: Worked as Delivery Manager for Ford at FTSI. Responsible for Delivery and Project Management for various projects at Ford. Lead more than 50 members in various teams in CAD development. Well versed in CATIA development, Open I-DEAS and related apis. Technolgies used include CAA, C++, Java UNIX and windows.
exp_summary7: Developed Funcational modelling based CAD package called IX SPeed Suite. Worked with impactxoft & Toyota caelum in developing various features of the CAD package. Technologies include C++, VC++ on windows.
exp_summary8: Developed domestic software products like hospital management tool in VB and VC++.
exp_summary9: Developed CMMS ( Computerized Maintenance Management Software ) for HPCL used as a predective maintenance tool for rotary machines.

name: Lakshmi Narasimhan
headline: Chief Financial Officer at Magma Fincorp Ltd
summary: I am an informal and like to mix my fun and work! I have transited through the following functions during the past 25 years in the industry: Sales / Risk / Credit / Collections / Legal / HRD / Treasury, before finally settling in as CFO. My last role was that of Group Business Head. Previously, I have held senior positions including that of National Risk & Credit Head and Head-Fee-based Business. Further information on me and the management team can be found on our website www.magma.co.in

name: Vijayalaxmi Ganesan Thangaraj
headline: Business Analyst and QA
summary: •	Experience in Customer support, Technical and System Analysis, Software development, Reporting, Software Testing and Process Management for various domains such as Banking, Capital markets and Insurance industries. • Certified Scrum master with excellent experience in Agile and Scrum methodologies since 2013. •	A project planner with expertise in mapping requirements of clients as well as the different stakeholders, partners, service providers, vendors; managing project deliveries and customizing process & offering comprehensive solutions in line with guidelines specified by client. •	Good knowledge on SDLC in both Waterfall and Agile methodologies and have excellent working knowledge in Scaled Agile. •. Strong Mainframes based experience using development tools like Microfocus and Accurev. •	Excellent working knowledge in SQL and large data handling using databases like DB2, IDMS, Table space, VSAM files and MS-Excel Formulas, Macros, Pivot table and Charts. • Good understanding and work experience in Continuous Delivery in a DevOps model. •	Strong conceptual and practical understanding of IT Infrastructure. •	Excellent communication (verbal and written) negotiation and facilitation skills. •	Self starter who is keen to learn and has a will to succeed. •	Excellent knowledge in Configuration Control and has worked for CMM Level 5 Projects. •	Works with the team to instil a strong sense of teamwork by agreeing roles, responsibilities and processes.

Software Testing Space aims to be the leading group with a global membership of budding, growing and senior/ leading software testing professionals. Anyone interested in or involved in any way with software testing is welcome to join and contribute to the group. Please go through the following rules before posting a discussion or comment. 1. Do not post any content that is not related (directly or indirectly) to software testing. Duplicate or irrelevant content will be removed immediately. 2. You are requested to post a comment based on the discussion and not anything else. If you have an off-topic question or comment, you should create a separate discussion. 3. Do not post any content that violates any laws (including but not limited to copyright laws) applicable to you. 4. Advertising or soliciting customers for your products or services is strictly prohibited. 5. You may submit any job posts. 6. You can network with other group members. 7. You should not spam other group members by posting unwanted content or sending unwanted private messages. 8. Any group member indulging in unreasonable or unintended behavior may be removed from the group. name: Tamilarasan Rajendran
headline: Senior Consultant at HCL Technologies
summary: •	Possess 6 years of extensive experience in core java, object oriented java script, GWT, TIBCO BW, EMS. •	TIBCO EMS 6, SCJP 1.5 and IBM XML professional from an organization of repute. Worked for clients like CITI,KOHLS,NIELSEN •	Website/ Webapp design & development (JavaScript, CSS, XHTML, Perl, PHP, etc.) and created web application UI with JavaScript, AJAX, CSS, & X/HTML •	Front end development using standards based HTML5 and CSS3 working with jQuery. •	Proficient in ORM mapping such as hibernate 3.0. Used Hibernate framework for the backend persistence. •	Worked in-memory database such as active spaces which gives share nothing persistence similar to HADOOP. •	Hands–on experience in writing test cases and automating the application using SOAP UI and groovy script. •	Successfully installed, configured, developed, tested, deployed and administered integration projects using TIBCO Business Works integration platform and TIBCO Administrator. •	Gaining Development, Management, support and quality assurance knowledge of TIBCO's EAI suite of products which includes TIBCO Administrator 5.x, TIBCO Business Works 5.x, TIBCO Designer 5.x, and TIBCO Enterprise Messaging Service 4.x. Gathered experience on requirement gathering, analysis, estimation and design of EAI projects.

name: Prabhu Nadarajan
headline: Senior Documentum Developer
summary: Prabhu Nadarajan has 13 plus years of experience in the field of Application Software Development. He has domain expertise in Enterprise Content Management and worked extensively in EMC Documentum Suite of Products, EMC Document Sciences xPression Suite of Product and QUMAS DocCompliance Suite of products. He is proficient in IT strategy, full life-cycle development and has subject matter expertise in Enterprise content management, and in Data capture software. He has involved in full life-cycle development of Enterprise Content management solutions for leading Oil & refinery Companies, Fortune 500 Insurance companies and he has worked with major Pharmaceutical companies for developing/Supporting Content and Compliance management Tools. He has worked extensively in Documentum Suite of products, EMC Document Sciences xPression Suite of products, Web application development framework, Java/J2EE, JSP, JavaScript and XML architecture. Well versed in RDBMS like Oracle, SQL Server and OS concepts on Windows NT/2000 & UNIX platforms. Specialties: EMC Documentum Suite Products EMC Document Sciences xPression Suite of Product J2EE

linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-13857660, id:-556937871, name:-Ron Murphy, created_date:-2014-10-17 01:08:21, date_and_relationship:-2014-10-17 01:08:21, Ron managed Satish, headline:-Principal Member of Technical Staff, Architect at eBay, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/romurphy/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/0c3/3ea/3324920.jpg, summary:-Satish worked on eBay's Java "kernel" functionality and showed his skills as a systems programmer in Java. He implemented a prototype of asynchronous dispatching and simple priority queuing within Servlet 3.0 specification, and this made an excellent demo and proof of concept. Satish also implemented a specialization of a process management framework in Java for one of our use cases, and it was cleanly done and reusable for more general purpose, although we did not take that forward. I can definitely recommend Satish as a very good systems programmer who would be able to make a contribution to any Java back end team. <> profile_member_id:-49328758, id:-23220792, name:-Kamal Congevaram Muralidharan, created_date:-2011-01-05 14:58:47, date_and_relationship:-2011-01-05 14:58:47, worked in same group, headline:-Sr. Member Technical Staff at PayPal, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/kamalakannancm/, summary:-Satish is a dedicated and motivated leader. His technical capabilities and managing trends are awesome. He managed the eBay Rules engine team and created a successful product. His dedication can be seen in the way he resolves issues and find solutions for complex situations. I strongly recommend Satish for a technical managerial role. <> profile_member_id:-37664250, id:-10423315, name:-Mike Russell, created_date:-2009-04-20 03:13:12, date_and_relationship:-2009-04-20 03:13:12, Mike is client of Satish, headline:-Software Architect, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/miker417/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/3/000/018/2f6/0084bbb.jpg, summary:-I am the President of Auscom Inc, and a web application architect/engineer and Subject Matter Expert at Visa Inc. I have known Satish Kumar A Srinivasan for over two years on two related software development projects at Visa. Satish was the software development team lead and a principal software architect of Visa’s subcontracted Indian development teams for those projects. In those roles he led groups of up to 15 software developers with the task of implementing complex business requirements, use cases, and high-level design documents from design to delivery of deployable, fully compliant executables and related artifacts, on time and on budget. Satish specializes in the design and implementation of web applications and web services. His expertise includes in-depth knowledge of modern development processes and techniques, languages, browsers, numerous open source tools, database management systems, development IDEs, hardware infrastructures, security paradigms, design patterns, etc. This broad expertise proved invaluable on numerous occasions when Satish recommended innovative design concepts for complicated software components that had not occurred to in-house Visa architects. These design approaches saved Visa many development man-hours and thousands in development costs, with attendant schedule improvements. However Satish’s value goes beyond the technical accomplishments of an experienced engineer/architect. Visa projects are developed under very aggressive schedules to coincide with Visa’s yearly business cycle. Like all development teams, offshore programmers vary in skills and experience. By both example and encouragement, Satish expertly mentored his charges through a lot of late night sessions to meet deadlines in time zones far from his own. With superior language skills and an evenhanded temperament, Satish was able to communicate complex technical issues with onshore engineers and managers, and he negotiated excellent compromise solutions for many thorny technical problems. Visa is notorious for enhancing requirements while development is ongoing. Satish deftly changed gears on more than one occasion during these projects, demonstrating a unique combination of both technical and personal skills. Somehow he always got the job done, often more skillfully than I myself could do. I can frankly say that my job was made a lot easier by his patient, intelligent interactions with both managers and subordinates. I highly recommend Satish Kumar A Srinivasan. Mike Russell President, Auscom Inc. Software Architect/Engineer, Visa Inc.

In case of any issues, please drop me an email. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=2664629&goback=, group_name:-Career Coach Forum, no_of_members:-10901, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/2/000/045/2e2/08e9087.png, group_id:-2664629, group_description:-PURPOSE The Career Coach Forum is a Linked-In group for practising career coaches. The Forum aims to be a space where careers specialists can exchange thinking on best practice, pass on news and information, ask questions and seek resources, and - above all else - share experiences and learning. The Forum aims to provide cutting edge thinking on a wide range of career coaching issues. MATERIAL Members may feel free to post questions, suggestions and requests for information. News about new approaches and resources is also welcome (but see our Rules on marketing material). Announcements aimed at the general public, for example job announcements or material promoting a coach's services to the buying public, will generally not be accepted. HOST AND MODERATOR John Lees, UK career strategist and author. MEMBERSHIP The Career Coach Forum accepts membership applications from practising career coaches in any part of the world. The term "practising career coaches" will be applied as flexibly as possible, and has to date been taken to include those in training to deliver career coaching, those who offer career development work as part of a broader remit, and experienced career coaches who are not seeing clients at the moment. The Forum is only open to individuals. It is a closed forum, with moderated posts only available to members. ETIQUETTE Like other groups on Linked In, the Forum has a strict policy on online bullying, including forceful and inappropriate language. The Career Coach Forum has limited tolerance for online promotion. Sales or promotional material which is also informative may be acceptable, but will otherwise be transferred to the Promotions section. See the Group Rules for more information. <> group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=45320&goback=, group_name:-CHENNAI HR CLUB, no_of_members:-11420, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/1/000/063/1e2/0af233d.png, group_id:-45320, group_description:-CHENNAI HR CLUB is a community of HR experts and professionals to promote awareness, networking and informative discussions with one another. linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-41904547, id:-35092595, name:-Prasun Mitra, created_date:-2012-03-22 02:14:04, date_and_relationship:-2012-03-22 02:14:04, Prasun senior than Kavitha, headline:-Business Process, Data Mgmt, Modelling, DWH, SAP Business One, ECC, BW, BI, Data Analytics, Real Time Data, Images, Text, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/prasun-mitra-39704a12/, summary:-As Head of a newly formed "Practice" that called for a massive reorganization exercise, I had to overcome attendant HR challenges that encompassed addressing employee concerns, handling employee-manager relationships, career mappings, "town-hall meets", recruitment, to name a few. It would have been difficult for me to seamlessly execute our plans during these "transition" days had it not been for the indefatigable efforts and the positive attitude of Kavitha. I find her extremely valuable for any HR team and would wait to work with her again. <> profile_member_id:-68217508, id:-35090847, name:-CD Murthy, created_date:-2012-03-21 23:49:00, date_and_relationship:-2012-03-21 23:49:00, CD senior than Kavitha, headline:-Founder and CEO at CDB IT Solutions (P) Ltd, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/cd-murthy-884a191a/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/2/000/05c/266/0dca836.jpg, summary:-Kavitha, seems to be having solution for any most of the things that u ask for in work. Nice professional to work with. <> profile_member_id:-6153095, id:-35003282, name:-Kishore Rajgopal, created_date:-2012-03-19 11:17:21, date_and_relationship:-2012-03-19 11:17:21, Kishore is client of Kavitha, headline:-CTO at ItemMaster, Teacher of Yoga and Meditation, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/rajgopalkishore/, profile_image:-https://media.licdn.com/media/AAEAAQAAAAAAAATrAAAAJDMxNzliNGQ3LTg3YzUtNGQ1Zi1iYTM4LThjNmY3MTIxOGQ5Mw.jpg, summary:-Kavitha was my head of operations when I headed the BI & analytics practice at one of my previous companies. She handled all of business operations - sales, order book, HR operations, and general financial report of the unit. Kavitha was very professional in her approach; she understood her responsibilities very well; she worked without supervison; self driven; set her own goals and could find her own ways to accompllish inspite of hurdles. She provided advice whenever needed. She was resourceful - find her way out even in difficult situations. I wish her all the best in her career. <> profile_member_id:-37761523, id:-23274213, name:-Arunkumar Ganesan, created_date:-2011-01-07 21:13:33, date_and_relationship:-2011-01-07 21:13:33, worked in same group, headline:-Senior Account Executive at Accenture Australia, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/arunkumar-ganesan-89779010/, summary:-Kavitha has got the conviction to execute initiatives and did execute many with adequate perfection. name: Mathi Annadurai
headline: Senior Application Support Engineer at Saudi Arabian Cooperative Insurance Company (SAICO)
summary: 	19+ years of overall commended performance in Oracle & Microsoft Technologies with 16 years of experience in Insurance Product development, Customization, Maintenance and Customer Support. 	Dedicated, proactive and dynamic professional with broad experience in Project Management, adherence to Process and Quality Improvement, with sharp business acumen. 	Currently reporting to CIO with the capacity of IT Applications Development Manager in Saudi Arabian Co-operative Insurance Company (SAICO) since July 2010. Heading the Application Development, Maintenance, Support, and Integrations with various applications (PREMIA, PAMS, Oracle EBS, Motor Quotation, Motor Claims, and CRM) 	9 years of Work Experience in 3i Infotech for PREMIA Product. Reported to Practice Head with the capacity of Product Maintenance Head – Offshore servicing Middle East, Africa & Russia Regions and from June 2008 to June 2010. Responsible for 85 Customer Projects on General, Life insurance and common modules during the period involved multiple stages of Implementation, UAT, warranty and AMC. 	Achieved Cycle-time reduction (around 50%) and Better User Interface (UI) by developing Reusable Bolts-on /Custom Application to address the GAPs identified in PREMIA System.

edu_school_name1: Shanmugha Arts, Science, Technology and Research Academy
exp_summary1: •	Oracle E-Business Suite Integration with Core Insurance System. o	Played the key role in AP/AR interfaces solution design, and program development. o	Enabled automatic financial posting program from various operational system (PREMIA- General, PAMS-Medical and PREMIA-Life). o	Acted as an SME in sharing the business knowledge and inputs to the system integration team and coordinated with Business and System Integrator to ensure Quality Testing and User Acceptance. •	Played anchor role on Architecting, Solution Designing, development, and implementation of Motor Business related in-house projects. o	Motor Quotation System – New Quotation, Auto renewal, policy generation to Core system -PREMIA, Work flow management and transaction management. o	Motor Claims System – Auto Claim registration, Work flow management, Claim authorization and approval management. Financial integration with Oracle E-Business. •	Developed and Implemented the Microsoft’s Dynamics CRM Integration with SAICO Core Insurance Systems. •	Implemented Business Process Automation o	Tariff Automation for MOTOR Product o	B2B- Automatic Upload to the Najm System for the Motor Policy o	Re-insurance Allocation for Proportional Treaty and Treaty Accounting Automation - Treaty Premium, Commission, Leader Fee and Claim Recoveries. •	Implemented the Decision Support System ( DSS ) - Loss Analysis by LOB , SOB, Customer & Broker o	Single-Point-of-Contact (SPOC) for business regulation/authorities: o	Regulator / SAMA for Various Data Analysis requests and responsible for the various compliance requests. •	Implemented TRICAST (BI -Simulations of profitability) , Tricast provides insurance companies with a set of business intelligence and actuarial tools which allows them to perform analyses and run simulations, in order to increase competitiveness and underwriting profit.
exp_summary2: •	Providing support to team members and also making them take the lead, interaction with delivery and product team on taking up new projects for support with strict vigilance on all handovers, without compromising the stability of existing product, is my key achievement. •	Deliberate and guide the team for implementing Automated Identification of Data Issues and Correction of data issues by means of multiple validations and scheduled jobs. •	Implemented multiple Functionality and Cross version Fix for repetitive issues, which drastically reduced the incoming tickets which created the much required bandwidth for our team to focus on bringing up additional features to the product. •	Implemented Health Check Scripts Tool customized for customers/projects as and when required, to Smoothen the Customer IT team’s Operation for smooth Month-end, Quarter-end, and Year-end closure with minimal dependency. •	Created Knowledge base to Left-shift the accountability which reduced the volume of tickets and increased Self-service by Developing FAQs, Knowledge Articles which are available and published to customers. •	Instrumental in generating additional revenue to support apart from the AMC, by identifying solutions for additional requests and enhancements from requirements from business and operational heads, and taking up the customizations under customer support frame work. •	Involved in the “Requirement Gathering and Scoping” , Impact Analysis ( Functional and Technical) , Code Review , Implementation , Customization , Maintenance , Product Upgrade and Testing and QA. •	Developed the Data upload / Risk Upload (Excel Data to Application) for Home, Motor policies for corporate customers. •	In the development of policy approval, claim approval and RI allocation packages. •	Actively involved in the fine-tuning the Programs / Code which helped to improve the application performance.

linkedin_projects: number_of_project_members:-0, project_title:-Customer Profiling, project_start_date:-2008-7, project_end_date:-2009-7, project_description:-Customer profiling is H3GA campaign management system having Customer Data Warehouse, Customer Profile Data Mart and an Operational Data Warehouse. The Customer Data Warehouse provides a complete integrated view of Customers in one single place, including their interactions, usage and history. Customer Profile Data Mart is used for BI Reporting, Campaign Management and Analytics and they are built from the published data in the Customer Data Warehouse. The Customer Profiling will publish the snapshots and reports of Sales, Activations, Handset, Churn and Demographics. Customer profiling have modular framework for Metadata, Batch, Error and Auditing loggings

summary: Shyam Nivas is Principal Product Consultant at Cognizant Product Professional Services (PPS) division with experience in helping customer implement Distribution & Incentive Management solution. Shyam Nivas has experience in driving practice growth, competency & product partnership. Area of specialization: Product assessment, Technology road map definition, Business process standardization, Solution design & large scale business transformation program implementation Strength: -Deep domain expertise in Distribution & Incentive Management area -Implementation experience on multiple industry leading products (CallidusCloud- ProducerPro,TrueProducer & TrueComp, IBM ICM Cognos (Varicent) & Vertafore SIRCON) -Business development through differentiated solutions -Strong focus on understanding customer business problem and solution recommendation -People competency development by personal coaching

exp_title1: Distribution & Incentive Management Practice Lead - Insurance
exp_summary1: Key Assignments: 1. Licensing & Commission system implementation on CallidusCloud platform for NY based Life insurer (ProducerPro & TrueComp) • Lead architecture and design for Licensing & Commission platform implementation • Liaison with Callidus solution architect on complex or key design areas and ensure best solution implementation • Responsible for defining and designing re-usable design components for the program • Responsible for industry standard business process recommendation & standardization • Responsible for consolidation of interfaces across Life & Retirement Business Units • Provide technical guidance to Team of Product & Integration Consultants 2. Distribution Platform Management (DPM) readiness assessment for Indiana based Life insurer (IBM ICM Cognos & Aurea Versata) • Define engagement approach, deliverable, template and timeline for readiness assessment • Lead readiness assessment Team, Review deliverable and provide feedback on functional & technical areas • Create high level solution design and implementation road map • Define staffing need & cost for the program including customer support staff 3. Career Channel Financing plan implementation for NY based Life Insurer (IBM ICM Cognos Platform) • Work with client business system analysts to understand requirement for program • Define ICM Cognos and integration layer data model • Provide technical guidance to Product and Integration consultants • Conduct design & ICM model review with stakeholders 4. Licensing & Commission platform assessment for NY based Life insurer (Calliduscloud & IBM ICM Cogns) • Discover current state functional and technical details • Stakeholder interview to understand vision, objective and expectation from future state • Define future state feature list, integration and migration need & high level solution design • Perform fit gap analysis of future state and submit detailed report on each product • Create program roadmap for business transformation
exp_summary2: • Provide functional, technical & delivery leadership to all projects related to customer Distribution Portfolio. Key projects implemented 1.IBM ICM Cognos implementation-Producer Bonus program 2.Agency Administration Workstation implementation 3.Straight-Thru-Processing (STP) using SIRCON Producer Express 4.Just-in-Time (JIT) appointment framework for new business • Ensuring Project delivery, perform review of project plans, schedules and deliverable with offshore Project Leads • Proactively defining, driving and tracking KPIs that drive value for customer • Ensuring clear and timely communication and reporting of status of various projects to internal and external stakeholders. Identify & mitigate risks proactively • Manage client expectations, provide updates to the senior management, participate in steering review meetings • Provide thought leadership / innovation to client in managing projects • Mentoring project leads & team members to ensure that they are delivering a professional, high quality, high value & responsive service experience to the client
exp_summary3: • Provide functional and technical leadership to projects related to producer life cycle management application. Key projects implemented: 1. Agency system of record using Oracle DB 2. Appointment Optimization project resulting in multimillion dollar saving in appointment renewal fee 3. Agency Relationship Management 4. Fixed value based bonus compensation program • Manage onsite Cognizant team for planning, execution and seamless coordination with the offshore team • Liaise with client management team for resource ramp up/down planning to meet the project requirements • Report project progress, risks, revenue forecast and client feedback to the Cognizant onsite Account manager on a regular basis • Identify all risks upfront and document a mitigation plan for client management’s attention and remediation • Attend client management meetings for presenting project status report and dashboard
exp_summary4: • Responsible for understanding requirement from business SME and co-coordinate work with Offshore from requirement until implementation and post implementation support Key projects implemented 1. License expiry process 2. Appointment re-conciliation • Responsible for reviewing detail design, code, test plan and test cases with SME • Responsible for updating and deciding interfaces with other interfacing systems • Responsible for weekly project status, task sheet and time entry planning
exp_summary5: • Participate in concept solution review, estimation, business requirement and system requirement review • Responsible for co-coordinating work with Offshore from high level design to implementation and post implementation support • Responsible for creating all type of testing scenarios such as Pair testing, Application testing, Integration testing & End to End testing • Assisted System testing team in data preparation, validating output and providing all required testing results to client • Responsible for timeliness metrics & accuracy metrics for residential billing
exp_summary6: • Responsible for understanding requirement for enhancements • Responsible for creating design document and developing code, unit test plan & test execution report • Perform deliverable review with onshore lead • Perform quality assurance support and post deployment activities • Provide daily status to project lead

linkedin_received_recommendations: profile_member_id:-10026785, id:-576769521, name:-Khadija Haque, created_date:-2015-10-12 22:34:23, date_and_relationship:-2015-10-12 22:34:23, Khadija is client of Boban, headline:-Chief of Staff | Strategy, Corporate Planning and Operations | Oliver Wyman, profile_url:-https://www.linkedin.com/in/khadijahaque/, summary:-After finalizing realizing the importance of a good corporate portrait as my LinkedIn profile picture, I asked Boban for a session to shoot that perfect picture. I am very happy with my picture and can't recommend Boban enough.

name: Gopinath Ramakrishnan
headline: Partner at Vive Consulting Services
summary: I have over 25 years experience conceptualizing and executing Business Solutions for customers. My biggest strength is the ability to plan and execute complex initiatives, right from the ideation stage through to successful implementation. This often involves architecting innovative solutions and approaches, managing process changes, and assisting clients in managing organizational change. At Anantara Solutions, I conceptualized and built a unique ecosystem of business partners in information technology services and business consulting. I also managed the India operations, leading teams engaged on consulting assignments in the Automotive, Auto Components and Logistics industries. At Satyam, I built and managed the Six Sigma consulting practice, and also played a leadership role in the Supply Chain and Business Process consulting practices.

edu_school_name2: Govt. High School, Uthukottai in Tamil Nadu
exp_summary1: BOFTA Film Academy / School is my dream come true to commence a film school to train students across the world on Film Technology with the help of Masters Today BOFTA is the largest film school in Chennai with over 100 students studying in various streams including an Online course, which teaches students across the Globe. BOFTA's vision is to provide film education for students by learning from True Masters of Films.
exp_title2: Chief - South Business, Studios, Disney-UTV Motion Pictures
exp_summary2: Managing the motion pictures business of UTV in South Languages
exp_summary3: Managing the home entertainment business and also the film business
exp_summary4: Managed the entire operations of Moser Baer Entertainment at all-India level, which includes, sales, marketing, finance, product management, people, customer relationship, production management, stock management etc.
exp_summary5: Handled the Mumbai operations of Hutch (Vodafone now) and then managed the merger of BPL - TN with Hutch and also migrated the brand from BPL to Hutch across TN
exp_summary6: Managed one of the large Mobile operations of Airtel at Karnataka. Achieved over 100% growth in subscriber base in 12 months time and then moved to Vice President - Customer Service Delivery operations in the same circle.
exp_summary7: Managed one of the large Mobile operations of Airtel at Karnataka. Achieved over 100% growth in subscriber base in 12 months time and then moved to Vice President - Customer Service Delivery operations in the same circle.
exp_summary8: Managed Sales, Marketing and Operations of the business circle of the Telecom operations
exp_summary9: Managed the National Sales and Marketing of Regional languages of Saregama's Music Business. Was responsible for the turn around of the company on both top line and bottom line. The share price went up by over 6 times during my tenure.
exp_summary10: Managed the entire Marketing operations of the company at all-India level, which includes, product management, advertisiting management and customer relationship management.

name: Bharat Sarma
headline: Managing Director at Gateway Partners
summary: Seasoned Private Equity investor with deep experience in investing in Emerging markets - Southeast Asia, India, Middle East and Africa. Leadership roles as a Private equity GP, Management consultant and in Corporate development. Started up offices in Singapore, India and Dubai, built and led investment teams. Over the years in private equity, have invested in, managed and exited multiple companies. Extensive involvement at the Board of multiple portfolio companies. Lived and worked professionally globally - in Asia, US, Europe and the Middle East.

linkedin_groups: group_link:-https://www.linkedin.com/groups?gid=38114&goback=, group_name:-Private Equity, M&A, and Venture Capital Investments, no_of_members:-331340, group_logo:-https://media.licdn.com/media/p/8/005/07e/3e8/164ad35.png, group_id:-38114, group_description:-A leading community of private equity, M&A, and venture capital professionals coming together to share best practices, articles, books, events, and deal flow. We provide live conferences, the Certified Private Equity Professional (CPEP) training program, and we execute deals as well. Get your free private equity e-book at: http://PrivateEquity.com/Book Learn more at http://PrivateEquity.com and http://WilsonConferences.com or by emailing us at Team@PrivateEquity.com or calling our friendly team at 305-503-9050 Richard C. Wilson is CEO of The Miami Family Office, a $500M AUM single family office a single family office. Richard is also the founder of Wilson Holding Company which employs over 30 professionals and produces over $10M a year in revenue through various operating businesses which include Billionaire Family Office and The Family Club, the largest membership-based family office association (FamilyOffices.com), along with holdings in the training, single family office management (SingleFamilyOffices.com), investment conference, search, data research, physical bullion, private equity (PrivatEquity.com), food, and energy industries. Richard has spoken at over 150 conferences in 17 countries and has the #1 bestselling book in the family office industry, The Single Family Office: Creating, Operating, and Managing the Investments of a Single Family Office. Richard has his undergraduate degree from Oregon State University, his M.B.A. from University of Portland, and has studied master’s level psychology through Harvard’s ALM program while previously residing in Boston. CEO- Richard C. This group brings together the GPs, LPs, SWFs, f-o-f professionals, fund managers, advisors, placement agents, investment bankers, and market observers in private equity and VC across Asian and Australasian markets, including China, India, Australia, Japan, Korea, Hong Kong, Singapore, New Zealand, and the rest of East, Southeast and South Asia. exp_summary1: Leading investments in SE Asia, India, Middle East and Africa and leading the investment team. Focused on transactions between $30-$100mil. Served on Boards of multiple portfolio companies.
exp_summary2: Senior Director in the Singapore office. Led new investments and managed portfolio companies in Southeast Asia and Australia. Focused on control and significant minority transactions between $40-200 mil.
exp_summary3: Led investments, managed portfolio companies and divestments in South East Asia and India. Invested ~$400m in control buyouts across the region and led two exits. Was on the Board and managed multiple portfolio companies. Experienced two full fund-cycles of investing in SE Asia & India. Navis is a leading Asian private equity fund with AUM of US$4 Bil focused on growth buyout investments with a typical equity cheque of $40-$150 mil.
exp_summary4: Responsible for investments in India, SE Asia & Australia
exp_summary5: Member of the senior management team in the NY office. Led case teams in the Financial Services and TMT practices. Focused on business strategy, global expansion, growth assessment and acquisition diligence.
exp_summary6: Member of senior leadership team driving business strategy and revenues
exp_summary7: Part of the Telecommunications & Change Leadership Practices. Broad sector exposure across TMT, Insurance, Steel, Chemicals, Automotive. Worked across offices in India, US and Europe and led global teams

name: Prrakash Karunakaran
headline: Big Data Hadoop Consultant at Fidelity Investments
summary: Around 11+ years of experience in Data Warehousing field. 4+ years of strong expertise in Big Data Hadoop, AWS, Hive, Pig, Map Reduce, Spark, Scala, Sqoop, Impala, Core Java, ETL Tools - Informatica, Database Oracle, SQL , Teradata, Netezza and Autosys. Strong expertise in Application development Core Java, .Net, Java script Capable of making analytical and technical decisions, independently, to achieve desired end results. Strong knowledge in SDLC development which includes requirement analysis, technical design and development, code reviews,Unit/System testing and onsite offshore coordination.

Clients initiate requests to servers, who process the request and return appropriate responses. Applications are formed when clients communicate with servers, stepping through a series of application states. Requests and responses are built around the transfer of "representations" to or from "resources". A resource can be essentially any coherent and meaningful concept that requests could be addressed to. A representation is typically a document that captures the current or intended state of a resource. exp_summary2: Project: webMethods API-Portal Technology: Java/GWT ZooKeeper,ElasticSearch,Couchbase Key contributor for the development of webMethods API-Portal. Designed & Architected couple of critical features of API-Portal like user onboarding, API Publish. Gained expertise/knowledge with Distributed system based architecture.
exp_summary3: Project: CentraSite BusinessUI Technology: Java/GWT Database: Tamino(NoSQL xml database) Worked/Lead the Osgi-fication efforts for the CentraSite product. Gained expertise/Knowledge with OSGification of Modules/Web applications(WAB). Key contributor for the access key management implementation with CentraSite. Designed&Implemented key management policies. Gained expertise with GWT by designing couple of UI components with CentraSite Developed tool for purging huge amount of data from a Nosql store without hitting transaction timeouts.
exp_summary4: Project: CentraSite BusinessUI Technology: Java Database: Tamino(NoSQL xml database) CentraSite is a SOA registry and repository that eliminates rework, assures consistent quality and keeps your services aligned with business needs. Key member of the Silicon team which developed the backend layer(CentraSite Logic Layer - CLL). Worked/Gained expertise with xquery for the manipulation of data from a NoSQL database. Designed/Implemented couple of features like ReportingSearch/CSOM/Portlet/SavedSearches.. etc
exp_summary5: Project: Metadata Manager Technology: Java Database: Oracle/db2/MSSQL Server DW Appliances: Teradata/Netezza Gained expertise/certification with Informatica flagship product PowerCenter. Gained expertise in defining mapping flows for extracting metadata from desperate sources. Designed a web based utility to do drill-down analysis on a MM Warehouse(IMW). Active member of the couple of major release cycles with Informatica.
exp_summary6: Six month internship work that is part of the Curriculum. Was part of the Metadata Manager product team. Project: Metadata Manager Technology: Java Database: Oracle/db2/MSSQL Server DW Appliances: Teradata/Netezza Metadata Manager(MM) provides the visibility and control needed to manage change in a complex enterprise data integration environment. Developed a Load automation framework which actually configures metadata sources(xconnect) and trigger loads of resources. Baseline verification is done to compare the loaded metadata against a defined baseline and report any inconsistencies.
exp_summary7: Six month internship work that is part of the Curriculum. Was part of the Technology manufacturing group(TMG) which actually develops tools/utilities for the Intel Datawarehouse. Worked with offshore team to get the requirements and translated them to the required products. Project: development of Chipset DataIntegrity(DI) tool. Technology: ASP.net/C# .net Database: Oracle 10g Wrote & Maintained pl/sql stored procedures which runs periodically to collect the Data Integrity metrics from Intel datawarehouse. Worked with Oracle DBMS Packages & Schedulers. Developed rich UI to view metrics that is populated by the loaders.Graphical interface includes charts and filters to narrow down results.
honor_summary1: Received "Thank you" Award for the piece of development work that enabled a customer to delete a massive amount of unwanted data from the repository
honor_summary3: Received "Instant Award" for the piece of development work done for chipset Data Integrity tool in the course of my internship.
